These effects end when Razor leaves the battlefield. When Razor leaves the field, a maximum of 10 Energy will be returned to him based off the duration remaining on this skill.

talents.name: Awakening
talents.desc: Decreases <color=skill>Claw and Thunder</color>'s CD by 18%. Using <color=skill>Lightning Fang</color> resets the CD of <color=skill>Claw and Thunder</color>.

talents.name: Hunger
talents.desc: When Razor's Energy is below 50%, increases Energy Recharge by 30%.

talents.name: Wolvensprint
talents.desc:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption of your characters in the party by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Wolf's Instinct
constellations.desc: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.

constellations.name: Suppression
constellations.desc: Increases CRIT Rate against opponents with less than 30% HP by 10%.

constellations.name: Soul Companion
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Lightning Fang</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bite
constellations.desc: When casting <color=skill>Claw and Thunder</color> (Press), opponents hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

constellations.name: Sharpened Claws
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Claw and Thunder</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lupus Fulguris
constellations.desc:
Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as <color=electro>Electro DMG</color>.
When Razor is not using <color=skill>Lightning Fang</color>, a lightning strike on an opponent will grant Razor an <color=electro>Electro</color> Sigil for <color=skill>Claw and Thunder</color>.

talents.name: Spear of the Church
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Ravaging Confession
talents.desc:
Rosaria swiftly shifts her position to appear behind her opponent, then stabs and slashes them with her polearm, dealing <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color>.
This ability cannot be used to travel behind opponents of a larger build.

talents.name: Rites of Termination
talents.desc:
Rosaria's unique take on this prayer ritual: First, she swings her weapon to slash surrounding opponents; then, she summons a frigid Ice Lance that strikes the ground. Both actions deal <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color>.
While active, the Ice Lance periodically releases a blast of cold air, dealing <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> to surrounding opponents.

talents.name: Regina Probationum
talents.desc: When Rosaria strikes an opponent from behind using <color=skill>Ravaging Confession</color>, Rosaria's CRIT Rate increases by 12% for 5s.

talents.name: Shadow Samaritan
talents.desc:
Casting <color=skill>Rites of Termination</color> increases CRIT Rate of all nearby party members (except Rosaria herself) by 15% of Rosaria's CRIT Rate for 10s.
CRIT Rate Bonus gained this way cannot exceed 15%.

talents.name: Night Walk
talents.desc:
At night (18:00 – 6:00), increases the Movement SPD of your own party members by 10%.
Does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, or Spiral Abyss. Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the same effects.

constellations.name: Unholy Revelation
constellations.desc: When Rosaria deals a CRIT Hit, her ATK SPD increases by 10% and her Normal Attack DMG increases by 10% for 4s.

constellations.name: Land Without Promise
constellations.desc: The duration of the Ice Lance created by <color=skill>Rites of Termination</color> is increased by 4s.

constellations.name: The Wages of Sin
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Ravaging Confession</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Painful Grace
constellations.desc:
<color=skill>Ravaging Confession</color>'s CRIT Hits regenerate 5 Energy for Rosaria.
Can only be triggered once each time <color=skill>Ravaging Confession</color> is cast.

constellations.name: Last Rites
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Rites of Termination</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Divine Retribution
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Rites of Termination</color>'s attack decreases opponents' Physical RES by 20% for 10s.

talents.name: Shuumatsuban Ninja Blade
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash
talents.desc: The special technique of the Yoohoo Ninja Arts! Sayu curls up into a rolling Fuufuu Windwheel and smashes into opponents at high speed, dealing Anemo DMG. When the duration ends, she unleashes a Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick, dealing AoE Anemo DMG. Press Enters the Fuufuu Windwheel state, rolling forward a short distance before using the Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick. Hold Rolls about continuously in the Fuufuu Windwheel state, increasing Sayu's resistance to interruption while within that state. During this time, Sayu can control the direction of her roll, and can use the skill again to end her Windwheel state early and unleash a stronger version of the Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick. The Hold version of this skill can trigger Elemental Absorption. This skill has a maximum duration of 10s and enters CD once its effects end. The longer Sayu remains in her Windwheel state, the longer the CD. Elemental Absorption If Sayu comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro while in her Windwheel state, she will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use of this skill.

talents.name: Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry
talents.desc: The other super special technique of the Yoohoo Ninja Arts! It summons a pair of helping hands for Sayu. Deals Anemo DMG to nearby opponents and heals all nearby party members. The amount of HP restored is based on Sayu's ATK. This skill then summons a Muji-Muji Daruma. Muji-Muji Daruma At specific intervals, the Daruma will take one of several actions based on the situation around it: ● If the HP of nearby characters is above 70%, it will attack a nearby opponent, dealing Anemo DMG. ● If there are active characters with 70% or less HP nearby, it will heal the active character with the lowest percentage HP left. If there are no opponents nearby, it will heal active characters nearby even if they have 70% HP or more.

talents.name: Someone More Capable
talents.desc:
When Sayu triggers a Swirl reaction while active, she heals all your characters and nearby allies for 300 HP. She will also heal an additional 1.2 HP for every point of Elemental Mastery she has.
This effect can be triggered once every 2s.

talents.name: No Work Today!
talents.desc:
The Muji-Muji Daruma created by <color=skill>Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry</color> gains the following effects:
● When healing a character, it will also heal characters near that healed character for 20% the amount of HP.
● Increases the AoE of its attack against opponents.

talents.name: Yoohoo Art: Silencer's Secret
talents.desc:
When Sayu is in the party, your characters will not startle Crystalflies and certain other animals when getting near them.
Check the "Other" sub-category of the "Living Beings / Wildlife" section in the Archive for creatures this skill works on.

constellations.name: Multi-Task no Jutsu
constellations.desc: The Muji-Muji Daruma created by <color=skill>Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry</color> will ignore HP limits and can simultaneously attack nearby opponents and heal characters.

constellations.name: Egress Prep
constellations.desc:
<color=skill>Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash</color> gains the following effects:
● DMG of Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick in Tapping (mobile)/Press (PC & PlayStation) Mode increased by 3.3%.
● Every 0.5s in the Fuufuu Windwheel state will increase the DMG of this Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick by 3.3%. The maximum DMG increase possible through this method is 66%.

constellations.name: Eh, the Bunshin Can Handle It
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Skiving: New and Improved
constellations.desc:
Sayu recovers 1.2 Energy when she triggers a Swirl reaction.
This effect occurs once every 2s.

constellations.name: Speed Comes First
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sleep O'Clock
constellations.desc:
The Muji-Muji Daruma created by Sayu's <color=skill>Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry</color> will now also benefit from her Elemental Mastery. Each point of Sayu's Elemental Mastery will produce the following effects:
● Increases the damage dealt by the Muji-Muji Daruma's attacks by 0.2% ATK. A maximum of 400% ATK can be gained via this method.
● Increases the HP restored by the Muji-Muji Daruma by 3. A maximum of 6,000 additional HP can be restored in this manner.

talents.name: Fudou Style Martial Arts
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 5 fisticuffs empowered by a mighty wind, dealing Anemo DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a set amount of Stamina to perform a sweeping kick, dealing Anemo DMG. Plunging Attack Calling upon the surging wind, Heizou plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in his path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Heartstopper Strike
talents.desc: Press Wields the swift winds to launch a Heartstopper Strike that deals Anemo DMG. Hold Charges energy to unleash an even stronger blow. He will obtain the Declension effect while charging, which will increase the power of the Heartstopper Strike. When the skill button is released or the skill duration ends, he will strike forward, dealing Anemo DMG. Declension Increases the power of the next Heartstopper Strike. Max 4 stacks. When you possess 4 Declension stacks, the Conviction effect will be produced, which will cause the next Heartstopper Strike to be even stronger and have a larger AoE.

talents.name: Windmuster Kick
talents.desc:
Leaps into the air and uses the Fudou Style Vacuum Slugger and kicks his opponent. The Vacuum Slugger will explode upon hit and create an Arresting Windtunnel that pulls in nearby objects and opponents, dealing <color=anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</color>.

When Fudou Style Vacuum Slugger hits enemies affected by <color=hydro>Hydro</color>, <color=pyro>Pyro</color>, <color=cryo>Cryo</color> or <color=electro>Electro</color>, it afflicts them with Windmuster Iris. Moments later, Windmuster Iris explodes and dissipates, dealing AoE DMG of the corresponding elemental type.

Fudou Style Vacuum Slugger can afflict a maximum of four enemies with the Windmuster Iris. A single enemy cannot be afflicted by Irises of different elemental types at the same time.

talents.name: Paradoxical Practice
talents.desc: When Shikanoin Heizou activates a Swirl reaction while on the field, he will gain 1 Declension stack for <color=skill>Heartstopper Strike</color>. This effect can be triggered every 0.1s.

talents.name: Penetrative Reasoning
talents.desc: After Shikanoin Heizou's <color=skill>Heartstopper Strike</color> hits an opponent, increases all party members' (excluding Shikanoin Heizou) Elemental Mastery by 80 for 10s.

talents.name: Pre-Existing Guilt
talents.desc:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Named Juvenile Casebook
constellations.desc: For 5s after Shikanoin Heizou takes the field, his Normal Attack SPD is increased by 15%. He also gains 1 Declension stack for <color=skill>Heartstopper Strike</color>. This effect can be triggered once every 10s.

constellations.name: Investigative Collection
constellations.desc: The pull effect of the Arresting Windtunnel created by <color=skill>Windmuster Kick</color> is enhanced, and its duration is increased to 1s.

constellations.name: Esoteric Puzzle Book
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Heartstopper Strike</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Tome of Lies
constellations.desc:
The first Windmuster Iris explosion in each <color=skill>Windmuster Kick</color> will regenerate 9 Elemental Energy for Shikanoin Heizou. Every subsequent explosion in that <color=skill>Windmuster Kick</color> will each regenerate an additional 1.5 Energy for Heizou.
One <color=skill>Windmuster Kick</color> can regenerate a total of 13.5 Energy for Heizou in this manner.

constellations.name: Secret Archive
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Windmuster Kick</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Curious Casefiles
constellations.desc: Each Declension stack will increase the CRIT Rate of the <color=skill>Heartstopper Strike</color> unleashed by 4%. When Heizou possesses Conviction, this <color=skill>Heartstopper Strike</color>'s CRIT DMG is increased by 32%.

talents.name: Wind Spirit Creation
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 attacks using Wind Spirits, dealing Anemo DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Anemo DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Calling upon the power of her Wind Spirits, Sucrose plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308
talents.desc: Creates a small Wind Spirit that pulls opponents and objects towards its location, launches opponents within its AoE, and deals <color=anemo>Anemo DMG</color>.

talents.name: Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II
talents.desc: Sucrose hurls an unstable concoction that creates a Large Wind Spirit. While it persists, the Large Wind Spirit will continuously pull in surrounding opponents and objects, launch nearby opponents, and deal Anemo DMG. Elemental Absorption If the Wind Spirit comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro energy, it will deal additional Elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

talents.name: Catalyst Conversion
talents.desc: When Sucrose triggers a Swirl effect, all characters in the party with the matching element (excluding Sucrose) have their Elemental Mastery increased by 50 for 8s.

talents.name: Mollis Favonius
talents.desc: When <color=skill>Astable <color=anemo>Anemo</color>hypostasis Creation - 6308</color> or <color=skill>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> hits an opponent, increases all party members' (excluding Sucrose) Elemental Mastery based on 20% of Sucrose's Elemental Mastery for 8s.

talents.name: Astable Invention
talents.desc: When Sucrose crafts Character and Weapon Enhancement Materials, she has a 10% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Clustered Vacuum Field
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Astable <color=anemo>Anemo</color>hypostasis Creation - 6308</color> gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Beth: Unbound Form
constellations.desc: The duration of <color=skill>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> is increased by 2s.

constellations.name: Flawless Alchemistress
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Astable <color=anemo>Anemo</color>hypostasis Creation - 6308</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Alchemania
constellations.desc: Every 7 Normal and Charged Attacks, Sucrose will reduce the CD of <color=skill>Astable <color=anemo>Anemo</color>hypostasis Creation - 6308</color> by 1-7s.

constellations.name: Caution: Standard Flask
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Chaotic Entropy
constellations.desc: If <color=skill>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> triggers an Elemental Absorption, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for the corresponding absorbed element during its duration.

talents.name: Swiftshatter Spear
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to four consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Blazing Blessing
talents.desc:
Thoma vaults forward with his polearm and delivers a flame-filled flying kick that deals <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>, while also summoning a defensive Blazing Barrier.
At the moment of casting, Thoma's Elemental Skill applies <color=pyro>Pyro</color> to himself.
The DMG Absorption of the Blazing Barrier scales off Thoma's Max HP.
The Blazing Barrier has the following traits:
● Absorbs <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> 250% more effectively.
● When a new Blazing Barrier is obtained, the remaining DMG Absorption of an existing Blazing Barrier will stack and its duration will be refreshed.

The maximum DMG Absoprtion of the Blazing Barrier will not exceed a certain percentage of Thoma's Max HP.

talents.name: Crimson Ooyoroi
talents.desc: Thoma spins his polearm, slicing at his foes with roaring flames that deal AoE Pyro DMG and weave themselves into a Scorching Ooyoroi. Scorching Ooyoroi While Scorching Ooyoroi is in effect, the active character's Normal Attacks will trigger Fiery Collapse, dealing AoE Pyro DMG and summoning a Blazing Barrier. Fiery Collapse can be triggered once every 1s. Except for the amount of DMG they can absorb, the Blazing Barriers created in this way are identical to those created by Thoma's Elemental Skill, Blazing Blessing: ● Absorbs Pyro DMG 250% more effectively. ● When a new Blazing Barrier is obtained, the remaining DMG Absorption of an existing Blazing Barrier will stack and its duration will be refreshed. The maximum DMG Absorption of the Blazing Barrier will not exceed a certain percentage of Thoma's Max HP. If Thoma falls, the effects of Scorching Ooyoroi will be cleared.

talents.name: Imbricated Armor
talents.desc:
When your current active character obtains or refreshes a Blazing Barrier, this character's Shield Strength will increase by 5% for 6s.
This effect can be triggered once every 0.3 seconds. Max 5 stacks.

talents.name: Flaming Assault
talents.desc: DMG dealt by <color=skill>Crimson Ooyoroi</color>'s Fiery Collapse is increased by 2.2% of Thoma's Max HP.

talents.name: Snap and Swing
talents.desc: When you fish successfully in Inazuma, Thoma's help grants a 20% chance of scoring a double catch.

constellations.name: A Comrade's Duty
constellations.desc:
When a character protected by Thoma's own Blazing Barrier (Thoma excluded) is attacked, Thoma's own <color=skill>Blazing Blessing</color> CD is decreased by 3s, while his own <color=skill>Crimson Ooyoroi</color>'s CD is decreased by 3s.
This effect can be triggered once every 20s.

constellations.name: A Subordinate's Skills
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Crimson Ooyoroi</color>'s duration is increased by 3s.

constellations.name: Fortified Resolve
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Blazing Blessing</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Long-Term Planning
constellations.desc: After using <color=skill>Crimson Ooyoroi</color>, 15 Energy will be restored to Thoma.

constellations.name: Raging Wildfire
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Crimson Ooyoroi</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Burning Heart
constellations.desc: When a Blazing Barrier is obtained or refreshed, the DMG dealt by all party members' Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks is increased by 15% for 6s.

talents.name: Dough-Fu
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Guoba Attack
talents.desc: Summons Guoba, who will continuously breathe fire at opponents, dealing <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Pyronado
talents.desc: Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a <color=skill><color=pyro>Pyro</color>nado</color> whirling around her. The <color=skill><color=pyro>Pyro</color>nado</color> will move with your character for the ability's duration, dealing <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> to all opponents in its path.

talents.name: Crossfire
talents.desc: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.

talents.name: Beware, It's Super Hot!
talents.desc: When <color=skill>Guoba Attack</color>'s effects end, Guoba leaves a chili pepper on the spot where it disappeared. Picking up a chili pepper increases ATK by 10% for 10s.

talents.name: Chef de Cuisine
talents.desc: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on an ATK-boosting dish, Xiangling has a 12% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
constellations.desc: Opponents hit by Guoba's attacks have their <color=pyro>Pyro RES</color> reduced by 15% for 6s.

constellations.name: Oil Meets Fire
constellations.desc: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the opponent for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

constellations.name: Deepfry
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill><color=pyro>Pyro</color>nado</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Slowbake
constellations.desc: <color=skill><color=pyro>Pyro</color>nado</color>'s duration is increased by 40%.

constellations.name: Guoba Mad
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Guoba Attack</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Condensed Pyronado
constellations.desc: For the duration of <color=skill><color=pyro>Pyro</color>nado</color>, all party members receive a 15% <color=pyro>Pyro DMG Bonus</color>.

talents.name: Guhua Style
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen
talents.desc:
Xingqiu performs twin strikes with his sword, dealing <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color>. At the same time, this ability creates the maximum number of Rain Swords, which will orbit your active character.
The Rain Swords have the following properties:
● When a character takes DMG, the Rain Sword will shatter, reducing the amount of DMG taken.
● Increases the character's resistance to interruption.

20% of Xingqiu's <color=hydro>Hydro DMG Bonus</color> will be converted to additional DMG Reduction for the Rain Swords.

The maximum amount of additional DMG Reduction that can be gained this way is 24%.
The initial maximum number of Rain Swords is 3.
Using this ability applies the <color=hydro>Wet</color> status onto the character.

talents.name: Guhua Sword: Raincutter
talents.desc: Initiate Rainbow Bladework and fight using an illusory sword rain, while creating the maximum number of Rain Swords. Rainbow Bladework ● Your active character's Normal Attacks will trigger consecutive sword rain attacks, dealing Hydro DMG. ● Rain Swords will remain at the maximum number throughout the ability's duration.

talents.name: Hydropathic
talents.desc: When a Rain Sword is shattered or when its duration expires, it regenerates the current character's HP based on 6% of Xingqiu's Max HP.

talents.name: Blades Amidst Raindrops
talents.desc: Xingqiu gains a 20% <color=hydro>Hydro DMG Bonus</color>.

talents.name: Flash of Genius
talents.desc: When Xingqiu crafts Character Talent Materials, he has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

constellations.name: The Scent Remained
constellations.desc: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.

constellations.name: Rainbow Upon the Azure Sky
constellations.desc:
Extends the duration of <color=skill>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color> by 3s.
Decreases the <color=hydro>Hydro RES</color> of opponents hit by sword rain attacks by 15% for 4s.

constellations.name: Weaver of Verses
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Evilsoother
constellations.desc: Throughout the duration of <color=skill>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color>, the DMG dealt by <color=skill>Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen</color> is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: Embrace of Rain
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses
constellations.desc: Activating 2 of <color=skill>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color>'s sword rain attacks greatly enhances the third sword rain attack. On hit, the third sword rain attack also regenerates 3 Energy for Xingqiu.

talents.name: Dance on Fire
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Sweeping Fervor
talents.desc:
Xinyan brandishes her instrument, dealing <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> on nearby opponents, forming a shield made out of her audience's passion.
The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Xinyan's DEF and on the number of opponents hit.
● Hitting 0 – 1 opponents grants Shield Level 1: Ad Lib.
● Hitting 2 opponents grants Shield Level 2: Lead-In.
● Hitting 3 or more opponents grants Shield Level 3: Rave, which will also deal intermittent <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> to nearby opponents.

The shield has the following special properties:
● When unleashed, it infuses Xinyan with <color=pyro>Pyro</color>.
● It has 250% DMG Absorption effectiveness against <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Riff Revolution
talents.desc:
Strumming rapidly, Xinyan launches nearby opponents and deals Physical DMG to them, hyping up the crowd.
The sheer intensity of the atmosphere will cause explosions that deal <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> to nearby opponents.

talents.name: "The Show Goes On, Even Without An Audience..."
talents.desc:
Decreases the number of opponents <color=skill>Sweeping Fervor</color> must hit to trigger each level of shielding.
● Shield Level 2: Lead-In requirement reduced to 1 opponent hit.
● Shield Level 3: Rave requirement reduced to 2 opponents hit or more.

talents.name: "...Now That's Rock 'N' Roll!"
talents.desc: Characters shielded by <color=skill>Sweeping Fervor</color> deal 15% increased Physical DMG.

talents.name: A Rad Recipe
talents.desc: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a DEF-boosting dish, Xinyan has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Fatal Acceleration
constellations.desc:
Upon scoring a CRIT Hit, increases ATK SPD of Xinyan's Normal and Charged Attacks by 12% for 5s.
Can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Impromptu Opening
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Riff Revolution</color>'s Physical DMG has its CRIT Rate increased by 100%, and will form a shield at Shield Level 3: Rave when cast.

constellations.name: Double-Stop
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Sweeping Fervor</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wildfire Rhythm
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Sweeping Fervor</color>'s swing DMG decreases opponent's Physical RES by 15% for 12s.

constellations.name: Screamin' for an Encore
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Riff Revolution</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rockin' in a Flaming World
constellations.desc: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Xinyan's Charged Attacks by 30%. Additionally, Xinyan's Charged Attacks gain an ATK Bonus equal to 50% of her DEF.

talents.name: Seal of Approval
talents.desc: Normal Attack Shoots fireballs that deal up to three counts of Pyro DMG. When Yanfei's Normal Attacks hit enemies, they will grant her a single Scarlet Seal. Yanfei may possess a maximum of 3 Scarlet Seals, and each time this effect is triggered, the duration of currently possessed Scarlet Seals will refresh. Each Scarlet Seal will decrease Yanfei's Stamina consumption and will disappear when she leaves the field. Charged Attack Consumes Stamina and all Scarlet Seals before dealing AoE Pyro DMG to the opponents after a short casting time. This Charged Attack's AoE and DMG will increase according to the amount of Scarlet Seals consumed. Plunging Attack Gathering the power of Pyro, Yanfei plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Pyro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Signed Edict
talents.desc:
Summons blistering flames that deal <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.
Opponents hit by the flames will grant Yanfei the maximum number of Scarlet Seals.

talents.name: Done Deal
talents.desc: Triggers a spray of intense flames that rush at nearby opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG, granting Yanfei the maximum number of Scarlet Seals, and applying Brilliance to her. Brilliance Has the following effects: ● Grants Yanfei a Scarlet Seal at fixed intervals. ● Increases the DMG dealt by her Charged Attacks. The effects of Brilliance will end if Yanfei leaves the field or falls in battle.

talents.name: Proviso
talents.desc: When Yanfei consumes Scarlet Seals by using a Charged Attack, each Scarlet Seal will increase Yanfei's <color=pyro>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> by 5%. This effects [sic] lasts for 6s. When a Charged Attack is used again during the effect's duration, it will dispel the previous effect.

talents.name: Blazing Eye
talents.desc: When Yanfei's Charged Attack deals a CRIT Hit to opponents, she will deal an additional instance of <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color> equal to 80% of her ATK. This DMG counts as Charged Attack DMG.

talents.name: Encyclopedic Expertise
talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Liyue on the mini-map.

constellations.name: The Law Knows No Kindness
constellations.desc: When Yanfei uses her Charged Attack, each existing Scarlet Seal additionally reduces the stamina cost of this Charged Attack by 10% and increases resistance against interruption during its release.

constellations.name: Right of Final Interpretation
constellations.desc: Increases Yanfei's Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 20% against enemies below 50% HP.

constellations.name: Samadhi Fire-Forged
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Signed Edict</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Supreme Amnesty
constellations.desc:
When <color=skill>Done Deal</color> is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 45% of Yanfei's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> 250% more effectively.

constellations.name: Abiding Affidavit
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Done Deal</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Extra Clause
constellations.desc: Increases the maximum number of Scarlet Seals by 1.

talents.name: Toss 'N' Turn Spear
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Raphanus Sky Cluster
talents.desc: Calls upon "Yuegui: Throwing Mode," a special device created by a certain adeptus to help Yaoyao solve her problems. This skill will be used differently in Holding Mode. Hold Enters Aiming Mode to adjust the throw direction. Yuegui: Throwing Mode Throws out White Jade Radishes that will explode upon hitting characters or opponents, dealing Dendro DMG to opponents within a certain AoE, and healing characters within that same AoE based on Yaoyao's Max HP. If a radish does not hit either an opponent or a character, the radish will remain where it is and explode on contact with a character or opponent, or will explode after its duration expires. Yuegui: Throwing Mode will choose its radish-throw targets. ● If all nearby characters have more than 70% HP remaining, then it will throw the radish at a nearby opponent. ● If nearby characters have 70% or less HP remaining, it will throw a radish at the character with the lowest HP percentage remaining. If no opponents exist nearby, Yuegui will throw White Jade Radishes at characters even if they all have more than 70% HP remaining. A maximum of 2 instances Yuegui: Throwing Mode can exist at any one time.

talents.name: Moonjade Descent
talents.desc: At the enjoinment of a certain adeptus, Yuegui's full potential can be unleashed in an emergency, dealing Dendro DMG to nearby opponents and entering an (in some sense) unsurpassed Adeptal Legacy state. Adeptal Legacy ● White Jade Radishes generated will be changed to heal and deal DMG according to this skill. Explosions will heal all nearby party members, and the Dendro DMG that they deal will be viewed as Elemental Burst DMG instead. ● Summons "Yuegui: Jumping Mode" at intervals until their limit has been reached. The behavior of this version of Yuegui is the same as that of "Yuegui: Throwing Mode" in the Elemental Skill, Raphanus Sky Cluster. A maximum of 3 Yuegui: Jumping Mode can exist at any one time. ● Yaoyao's Movement SPD is increased by 15%. ● Yaoyao's Dendro RES will be increased. The Adeptal Legacy state will end once Yaoyao is off-field, and all remaining Yuegui: Jumping Mode will be cleared once this state ends.

talents.name: Starscatter
talents.desc: While affected by the Adeptal Legacy state caused by <color=skill>Moonjade Descent</color>, Yaoyao will constantly throw White Jade Radishes at nearby opponents when she is sprinting, jumping, or running. She can throw 1 White Jade Radish this way once every 0.6s.

talents.name: In Others' Shoes
talents.desc: When White Jade Radishes explode, active characters within their AoE will regain HP every 1s based on 0.8% of Yaoyao's Max HP. This effect lasts 5s.

talents.name: Tailing on Tiptoes
talents.desc:
When Yaoyao is in the party, your characters will not startle Crystalflies and certain other animals when getting near them.
Check the "Other" sub-category of the "Living Beings / Wildlife" section in the Archive for creatures this skill works on.

constellations.name: Adeptus' Tutelage
constellations.desc: When White Jade Radishes explode, active characters within their AoE will gain 15% <color=dendro>Dendro DMG Bonus</color> for 8s and have 15 Stamina restored to them. This form of Stamina Restoration can only be triggered every 5s.

constellations.name: Innocent
constellations.desc: While affected by the Adeptal Legacy state caused by <color=skill>Moonjade Descent</color>, if White Jade Radish explosions damage opponents, 3 Energy will be restored to Yaoyao. This form of Energy regeneration can occur once every 0.8s.

constellations.name: Loyal and Kind
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Raphanus Sky Cluster</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Winsome
constellations.desc: After using <color=skill>Raphanus Sky Cluster</color> or <color=skill>Moonjade Descent</color>, Yaoyao's Elemental Mastery will be increased based on 0.3% of her Max HP for 8s. The maximum Elemental Mastery she can gain this way is 120.

constellations.name: Compassionate
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Moonjade Descent</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Beneficent
constellations.desc:
For every 2 White Jade Radishes Yuegui: Throwing Mode throws out, it will also throw a Mega Radish that will have a larger AoE than the standard White Jade Radish and have the following effects upon exploding:
● Deals <color=dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</color> based on 75% of Yaoyao's ATK.
● Restores HP for the active character based on 7.5% of Yaoyao's Max HP.

Every Yuegei: Throwing Mode can throw out a maximum of 2 Mega Radishes.

talents.name: Cloud-Grazing Strike
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Opening Flourish
talents.desc: Ms. Yun may just be acting out fights on stage, but her skills with the spear are real enough to defend against her foes. Press Flourishes her polearm in a cloud-grasping stance, dealing Geo DMG. Hold Takes up the Opening Flourish stance and charges up, forming a shield. DMG Absorption is based on Yun Jin's Max HP and has 150% effectiveness against all Elemental DMG and Physical DMG. The shield lasts until she finishes unleashing her Elemental Skill. When the skill is released, when its duration ends, or when the shield breaks, Yun Jin will unleash the charged energy as an attack, dealing Geo DMG. Based on the time spent charging, it will either unleash an attack at Charge Level 1 or Level 2.

talents.name: Cliffbreaker's Banner
talents.desc:
Deals <color=geo>AoE Geo DMG</color> and grants all nearby party members a Flying Cloud Flag Formation.

Flying Cloud Flag Formation
When Normal Attack DMG is dealt to opponents, Bonus DMG will be dealt based on Yun Jin's current DEF.
The effects of this skill will be cleared after a set duration or after being triggered a specific number of times.
When one Normal Attack hits multiple opponents, the effect is triggered multiple times according to the number of opponents hit. The number of times that the effect is triggered is counted independently for each member of the party with Flying Cloud Flag Formation.

talents.name: True to Oneself
talents.desc: Using <color=skill>Opening Flourish</color> at the precise moment when Yun Jin is attacked will unleash its Level 2 Charged (Hold) form.

talents.name: Breaking Conventions
talents.desc: The Normal Attack DMG Bonus granted by Flying Cloud Flag Formation is further increased by 2.5%/5%/7.5%/11.5% of Yun Jin's DEF when the party contains characters of 1/2/3/4 Elemental Types, respectively.

talents.name: Light Nourishment
talents.desc: When Perfect Cooking is achieved on Food with Adventure-related effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Thespian Gallop
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Opening Flourish</color>'s CD is decreased by 18%.

constellations.name: Myriad Mise-En-Scène
constellations.desc: After <color=skill>Cliffbreaker's Banner</color> is unleashed, all nearby party members' Normal Attack DMG is increased by 15% for 12s.

constellations.name: Seafaring General
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Cliffbreaker's Banner</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flower and a Fighter
constellations.desc: When Yun Jin triggers the Crystallize Reaction, her DEF is increased by 20% for 12s.

constellations.name: Famed Throughout the Land
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Opening Flourish</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Decorous Harmony
constellations.desc: Characters under the effects of the Flying Cloud Flag Formation have their Normal ATK SPD increased by 12%.

talents.name: Favonius Bladework - Weiss
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma
talents.desc: Albedo creates a Solar Isotoma using alchemy, which deals AoE Geo DMG on appearance. Solar Isotoma has the following properties: ● When opponents within the Solar Isotoma field take DMG, the Solar Isotoma will generate Transient Blossoms which deal AoE Geo DMG. DMG dealt scales off Albedo's DEF. ● Transient Blossoms can only be generated once every 2s. ● When a character is located at the locus of the Solar Isotoma, the Solar Isotoma will accumulate Geo power to form a crystallized platform that lifts the character up to a certain height. Only one crystallized platform can exist at a time. ● Solar Isotoma is considered a Geo construct. Only one Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself can exist at a time. Hold to designate the location of the skill.

talents.name: Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide
talents.desc:
Under Albedo's command, Geo crystals surge and burst forth, dealing <color=geo>AoE Geo DMG</color> in front of him.
If a Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself is on the field, 7 Fatal Blossoms will be generated in the Solar Isotoma field, bursting violently into bloom and dealing <color=geo>AoE Geo DMG</color>.

Tectonic Tide DMG and Fatal Blossom DMG will not generate Transient Blossoms.

talents.name: Calcite Might
talents.desc: Transient Blossoms generated by <color=skill>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> deal 25% more DMG to opponents whose HP is below 50%.

talents.name: Homuncular Nature
talents.desc: Using <color=skill>Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide</color> increases the Elemental Mastery of nearby party members by 125 for 10s.

talents.name: Flash of Genius (Albedo)
talents.desc: When Albedo crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Flower of Eden
constellations.desc: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's <color=skill>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

constellations.name: Opening of Phanerozoic
constellations.desc:
Transient Blossoms generated by <color=skill>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
● Unleashing Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
● This effect stacks up to 4 times.

constellations.name: Grace of Helios
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Descent of Divinity
constellations.desc: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.

constellations.name: Tide of Hadean
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of <color=skill>Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide</color> by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dust of Purification
constellations.desc: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.

talents.name: Abductive Reasoning
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Universality: An Elaboration on Form
talents.desc: Rushes forward, dealing Dendro DMG to nearby opponents when the rush ends, causing a Chisel-Light Mirror to form. Holding this skill will cause it to behave differently. Hold Enters Aiming Mode to adjust the direction of Alhaitham's rush attack. Chisel-Light Mirror When this skill is unleashed, Alhaitham will generate 1 Chisel-Light Mirror. If there are no Mirrors at this time, he will generate 1 additional Mirror. Chisel-Light Mirrors will have the following properties: ● When he possesses Chisel-Light Mirrors, Alhaitham's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks will be converted to Dendro DMG. This cannot be overridden. ● When attacks of the aforementioned kinds hit opponents, the Chisel-Light Mirrors will unleash a Projection Attack that deals AoE Dendro DMG based on the number of Mirrors on the field. ● A total of 3 Chisel-Light Mirrors can exist at once. ● The Chisel-Light Mirrors will disappear one after the other over time, and will all disappear when Alhaitham leaves the field.

talents.name: Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena
talents.desc:
Creates a Particular Binding Field and deals multiple instances of <color=dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</color>.
If Chisel-Light Mirrors exist when this ability is unleashed, all such Mirrors will be consumed and increase the number of DMG instances dealt.
2s after this ability is unleashed, if 0/1/2/3 Mirrors were consumed, Alhaitham will generate 3/2/1/0 new Mirrors in turn.

talents.name: Four-Causal Correction
talents.desc: When Alhaitham's Charged or Plunging Attacks hit opponents, they will generate 1 Chisel-Light Mirror. This effect can be triggered once every 12s.

talents.name: Mysteries Laid Bare
talents.desc:
Each point of Alhaitham's Elemental Mastery will increase the DMG dealt by Projection Attacks and <color=skill>Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena</color> by 0.1%.
The maximum DMG increase this way for both these abilities is 100%.

talents.name: Law of Reductive Overdetermination
talents.desc: When Alhaitham crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Intuition
constellations.desc: When a Projection Attack hits an opponent, <color=skill>Universality: An Elaboration on Form</color>'s CD is decreased by 1.2s. This effect can be triggered once every 1s.

constellations.name: Debate
constellations.desc: When Alhaitham generates a Chisel-Light Mirror, his Elemental Mastery will be increased by 50 for 8 seconds, max 4 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently. This effect can be triggered even when the maximum number of Chisel-Light Mirrors has been reached.

constellations.name: Negation
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Universality: An Elaboration on Form</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Elucidation
constellations.desc:
When <color=skill>Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena</color> is unleashed, the following effects will become active based on the number of Chisel-Light Mirrors consumed and created this time around:
- Each Mirror consumed will increase the Elemental Mastery of all other nearby party members by 30 for 15s.
- Each Mirror generated will grant Alhaitham a 10% <color=dendro>Dendro DMG Bonus</color> for 15s.

The pre-existing duration of the aforementioned effects will be cleared if you use Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena again while they are in effect.

constellations.name: Sagacity
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Structuration
constellations.desc:
Alhaitham gains the following effects:
● 2 seconds after <color=skill>Particular Field: Fetters of Phenomena</color> is unleashed, he will generate 3 Chisel-Light Mirrors regardless of the number of mirrors consumed.
● If Alhaitham generates Chisel-Light Mirrors when their numbers have already maxed out, his CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG will increase by 10% and 70% respectively for 6s.
If this effect is triggered again during its initial duration, the duration remaining will be increased by 6s.

talents.name: Rapid Fire
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, biting frost will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal Cryo DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Frozen Wilds
talents.desc: Aloy throws a Freeze Bomb in the targeted direction that explodes on impact, dealing Cryo DMG. After it explodes, the Freeze Bomb will split up into many Chillwater Bomblets that explode on contact with opponents or after a short delay, dealing Cryo DMG. When a Freeze Bomb or Chillwater Bomblet hits an opponent, the opponent's ATK is decreased and Aloy receives 1 Coil stack. Aloy can gain up to 1 Coil stack every 0.1s. Coil ● Each stack increases Aloy's Normal Attack DMG. ● When Aloy has 4 Coil stacks, all stacks of Coil are cleared. She then enters the Rushing Ice state, which further increases the DMG dealt by her Normal Attacks and converts her Normal Attack DMG to Cryo DMG. While in the Rushing Ice state, Aloy cannot obtain new Coil stacks. Coil effects will be cleared 30s after Aloy leaves the field.

talents.name: Prophecies of Dawn
talents.desc: Aloy throws a Power Cell filled with Cryo in the targeted direction, then detonates it with an arrow, dealing <color=cryo>AoE Cryo DMG</color>.

talents.name: Combat Override
talents.desc: When Aloy receives the Coil effect from Frozen Wilds, her ATK is increased by 16%, while nearby party members' ATK is increased by 8%. This effect lasts 10s.

talents.name: Strong Strike
talents.desc: When Aloy is in the Rushing Ice state conferred by Frozen Wilds, her <color=cryo>Cryo DMG Bonus</color> increases by 3.5% every 1s. A maximum <color=cryo>Cryo DMG Bonus</color> increase of 35% can be gained in this way.

talents.name: Easy Does It
talents.desc: When Aloy is in the party, animals who produce Fowl, Raw Meat, or Chilled Meat will not be startled when party members approach them.

constellations.name: Star of Another World (1)
constellations.desc: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.name: Star of Another World (2)
constellations.desc: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.name: Star of Another World (3)
constellations.desc: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.name: Star of Another World (4)
constellations.desc: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.name: Star of Another World (5)
constellations.desc: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.name: Star of Another World (6)
constellations.desc: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

talents.name: Fight Club Legend
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes. When the 2nd and 4th strikes hit opponents, Itto will gain 1 and 2 stacks of Superlative Superstrength, respectively. Max 5 stacks. Triggering this effect will refresh the current duration of any existing stacks. Additionally, Itto's Normal Attack combo does not immediately reset after sprinting or using his Elemental Skill, "Masatsu Zetsugi: Akaushi Burst!" Charged Attack When holding to perform a Charged Attack, Itto unleashes a series of Arataki Kesagiri slashes without consuming Stamina. Instead, each Arataki Kesagiri slash consumes 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength. When the final stack is consumed, Itto delivers a powerful final slash. If no stacks of Superlative Superstrength are available, Itto will perform a single Saichimonji Slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Masatsu Zetsugi: Akaushi Burst!
talents.desc: Hurls Ushi, the young akaushi bull and auxiliary member of the Arataki Gang, dealing Geo DMG to opponents on hit. When Ushi hits opponents, Arataki Itto gains 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength. Ushi will remain on the field and provide support in the following ways: ● Taunts surrounding opponents and draws their attacks. ● Inherits HP based on a percentage of Arataki Itto's Max HP. ● When Ushi takes DMG, Arataki Itto gains 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength. Only 1 stack can be gained in this way every 2s. ● Ushi will flee when its HP reaches 0 or its duration ends. It will grant Arataki Itto 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength when it leaves. Hold Adjust throwing angle. Ushi is considered a Geo Construct. Arataki Itto can only deploy 1 Ushi on the field at any one time.

talents.name: Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!
talents.desc:
Time to show 'em the might of the Arataki Gang! For a time, Itto lets out his inner Raging Oni King, wielding his Oni King's Kanabou in battle.
This state has the following special properties:
● Converts Itto's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks to <color=geo>Geo DMG</color>. This cannot be overridden.
● Increases Itto's Normal Attack SPD. Also increases his ATK based on his DEF.
● On hit, the 1st and 3rd strikes of his attack combo will each grant Arataki Itto 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength.
● Decreases Itto's Elemental and Physical RES by 20%.

The Raging Oni King state will be cleared when Itto leaves the field.

talents.name: Arataki Ichiban
talents.desc:
When Arataki Itto uses consecutive <color=skill>Arataki Kesagiri</color>, he obtains the following effects:
● Each slash increases the ATK SPD of the next slash by 10%. Max ATK SPD increase is 30%.
● Increases his resistance to interruption.

These effects will be cleared once he stops performing consecutive slashes.

talents.name: Bloodline of the Crimson Oni
talents.desc: <color=skill>Arataki Kesagiri</color> DMG is increased by 35% of Arataki Itto's DEF.

talents.name: Woodchuck Chucked
talents.desc: When a party member uses attacks to obtain wood from a tree, they have a 25% chance to obtain an additional log of wood.

constellations.name: Stay a While and Listen Up
constellations.desc: After using <color=skill>Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!</color>, Arataki Itto gains 2 stacks of Superlative Superstrength. After 1s, Itto will gain 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength every 0.5s for 1.5s.

constellations.name: Gather 'Round, It's a Brawl!
constellations.desc:
After using <color=skill>Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!</color>, each party member whose Element is <color=geo>Geo</color> will decrease that skill's CD by 1.5s and restore 6 Energy to Arataki Itto.
CD can be decreased by up to 4.5s in this manner. Max 18 Energy can be restored in this manner.

constellations.name: Horns Lowered, Coming Through
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Masatsu Zetsugi: Akaushi Burst!</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Jailhouse Bread and Butter
constellations.desc: When the Raging Oni King state caused by <color=skill>Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!</color> ends, all nearby party members gain 20% DEF and 20% ATK for 10s.

constellations.name: 10 Years of Hanamizaka Fame
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Arataki Itto, Present!
constellations.desc: Arataki Itto's Charged Attacks deal +70% Crit DMG. Additionally, when he uses <color=skill>Arataki Kesagiri</color>, he has a 50% chance to not consume stacks of Superlative Superstrength.

talents.name: The Classics of Acupuncture
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 attacks that deal Dendro DMG to opponents in front of him. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Dendro DMG to opponents in front of him after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Calling upon the might of Dendro, Baizhu plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in his path. Deals AoE Dendro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Universal Diagnosis
talents.desc: Controls a Gossamer Sprite that cruises and attacks nearby opponents, dealing Dendro DMG. After it performs 3 attacks or if there are no opponents nearby, the Sprite will return, healing all nearby party members based on Baizhu's Max HP. Those in the medical field who can read true signs of illness from false ones may even cure people before any symptoms can show.

talents.name: Holistic Revivification
talents.desc: Enters the Pulsing Clarity state, creating a Seamless Shield that absorbs Dendro DMG with 250% effectiveness. While in this state, Baizhu will generate a new Seamless Shield every 2.5s. The Seamless Shield will heal your own active character based on Baizhu's Max HP and attack opponents by unleashing Spiritveins, dealing Dendro DMG under the following circumstances: ·When a character is under the protection of a Seamless Shield and a new Seamless Shield is generated. ·When the Seamless Shield's effects expire, or when it is shattered. If you can perceive the heavens and the earth, defend against malignant auras with the flow of qi, and keep your mind clear, surely nothing can hinder you.

talents.name: Five Fortunes Forever
talents.desc:
Baizhu gains different effects according to the current HP of your current active character:
● When their HP is less than 50%, Baizhu gains 20% Healing Bonus.
● When their HP is equal to or more than 50%, Baizhu gains 25% <color=dendro>Dendro DMG Bonus</color>.

talents.name: All Things Are of the Earth
talents.desc: Characters who are healed by <color=skill>Seamless Shields</color> will gain the Year of Verdant Favor effect: Each 1,000 Max HP that Baizhu possesses that does not exceed 50,000 will increase the Burning, Bloom, Hyperbloom, and Burgeon reaction DMG dealt by these characters by 2%, while the Aggravate and Spread reaction DMG dealt by these characters will be increased by 0.8%. This effect lasts 6s.

talents.name: Herbal Nourishment
talents.desc: When Baizhu is in the party, interacting with certain harvestable items will heal your current active character for 2.5% of Baizhu's Max HP.

constellations.name: Attentive Observation
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Universal Diagnosis</color> gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Incisive Discernment
constellations.desc:
When your own active character hits a nearby opponent with their attacks, Baizhu will unleash a Gossamer Sprite: Splice.
Gossamer Sprite: Splice will initiate 1 attack before returning, dealing 250% of Baizhu's ATK as <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color> and healing for 20% of <color=skill>Universal Diagnosis</color>'s Gossamer Sprite's normal healing.
DMG dealt this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG.
This effect can be triggered once every 5s.

constellations.name: All Aspects Stabilized
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Holistic Revivification</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Ancient Art of Perception
constellations.desc: For 15s after <color=skill>Holistic Revivification</color> is used, Baizhu will increase all nearby party members' Elemental Mastery by 80.

constellations.name: The Hidden Ebb and Flow
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Universal Diagnosis</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Elimination of Malicious Qi
constellations.desc:
Increases the DMG dealt by <color=skill>Holistic Revivification</color>'s Spiritveins by 8% of Baizhu's Max HP.
Additionally, when a Gossamer Sprite or <color=skill>Gossamer Sprite</color>: Splice hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of generating one of <color=skill>Holistic Revivification</color>'s Seamless Shields. This effect can only be triggered once by each Gossamer Sprite or Gossamer Sprite: Splice.

talents.name: Invoker's Spear
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to four consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to enemies along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer
talents.desc:
Performs a swift thrust, dealing <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> to opponents along the path.

When Cyno is under the Pathsworn Pathclearer state triggered by the Elemental Burst "<color=skill>Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness</color>," he will instead unleash a Mortuary Rite that deals thunderous <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color> and extends the duration of Pathsworn Pathclearer.

talents.name: Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness
talents.desc: Calls upon a divine spirit to indwell him, morphing into the Pactsworn Pathclearer. Pactsworn Pathclearer Cyno's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks will be converted to Electro DMG that cannot be overridden. Cyno's Elemental Mastery and resistance to interruption will increase, and he gains immunity to Electro-Charged DMG. This effect will be canceled when Cyno leaves the field and lasts a maximum of 18s.

talents.name: Featherfall Judgment
talents.desc:
When Cyno is in the Pactsworn Pathclearer state activated by <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness</color>, Cyno will enter the Endseer stance at intervals. If he activates <color=skill>Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer</color> while affected by this stance, he will activate the Judication effect, increasing the DMG of this <color=skill>Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer</color> by 35%, and firing off 3 Duststalker Bolts that deal 100% of Cyno's ATK as <color=electro>Electro DMG</color>.

Duststalker Bolt DMG is considered Elemental Skill DMG.

talents.name: Authority Over the Nine Bows
talents.desc:
Cyno's DMG values will be increased based on his Elemental Mastery as follows:
● Pactsworn Pathclearer's Normal Attack DMG is increased by 150% of his Elemental Mastery.
● Duststalker Bolt DMG from his Passive Talent <color=skill>Featherfall Judgment</color> is increased by 250% of his Elemental Mastery.

talents.name: The Gift of Silence
talents.desc: Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on a Sumeru Expedition for 20 hours.

constellations.name: Ordinance: Unceasing Vigil
constellations.desc:
After using <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness</color>, Cyno's Normal Attack SPD will be increased by 20% for 10s. If the Judication effect of his Passive Talent <color=skill>Featherfall Judgment</color> is triggered during <color=skill>Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer</color>, the duration of this increase will be refreshed.
You need to unlock the Passive Talent "Featherfall Judgement."

constellations.name: Ceremony: Homecoming of Spirits
constellations.desc: When Cyno's Normal Attacks hit opponents, his <color=electro>Electro DMG Bonus</color> will increase by 10% for 4s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s. Max 5 stacks.

constellations.name: Precept: Lawful Enforcer
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Austerity: Forbidding Guard
constellations.desc:
When Cyno is in the Pactsworn Pathclearer state triggered by <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness</color>, after he triggers Electro-Charged, Superconduct, Overloaded, Quicken, Aggravate, Hyperbloom, or an Electro Swirl reaction, he will restore 3 Elemental Energy for all nearby party members (except himself.)
This effect can occur 5 times within one use of Sacred Rite: Wolf’s Swiftness.

constellations.name: Funerary Rite: The Passing of Starlight
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Raiment: Just Scales
constellations.desc:
After using <color=skill>Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness</color> or triggering the Judication effect of the Passive Talent "<color=skill>Featherfall Judgment</color>," Cyno will gain 4 stacks of the "Day of the Jackal" effect. When he hits opponents with Normal Attacks, he will consume 1 stack of "Day of the Jackal" to fire off one Duststalker Bolt.
"Day of the Jackal" lasts for 8s. Max 8 stacks. It will be canceled once Pactsworn Pathclearer ends.
A maximum of 1 Duststalker Bolt can be unleashed this way every 0.4s.
You must first unlock the Passive Talent "<color=skill>Featherfall Judgment</color>."

talents.name: Sandstorm Assault
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes using her Claymore and her martial arts. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.

talents.name: Molten Inferno
talents.desc: This art of Dehya's own invention changes its method of use depending on the combat situation. Indomitable Flame This skill will be unleashed should there be no Fiery Sanctum field created by Dehya herself present at the time. Deals AoE Pyro DMG, and creates a field known as Fiery Sanctum. Ranging Flame This skill will be unleashed should a Fiery Sanctum field created by Dehya herself already exist. Dehya will perform a leaping attack, dealing AoE Pyro DMG before recreating a Fiery Sanctum field at her new position. A Fiery Sanctum field created this way will inherit the remaining duration of the previous field. Ranging Flame can be used only once throughout a single Fiery Sanctum field's duration. Fiery Sanctum When an opponent within a Fiery Sanctum field takes DMG, the field will unleash a coordinated attack, dealing AoE Pyro DMG to them based on Dehya's ATK and Max HP. This effect can be triggered once every 2.5s. Active characters within this field have their resistance to interruption increased, and when such characters take DMG, a portion of that damage will be mitigated and flow into Redmane's Blood. Dehya will then take this DMG over 10s. When the mitigated DMG stored by Redmane's Blood reaches or goes over a certain percentage of Dehya's Max HP, she will stop mitigating DMG in this way. Only 1 Fiery Sanctum created by Dehya herself can exist at the same time.

talents.name: Leonine Bite
talents.desc: Unleashing her burning anger and casting her inconvenient blade aside, Dehya enters the Blazing Lioness state and increases her resistance to interruption. In this state, Dehya will automatically and continuously unleash the Flame-Mane's Fists, dealing Pyro DMG based on her ATK and Max HP, and when its duration ends, she will unleash an Incineration Drive, dealing AoE Pyro DMG based on her ATK and Max HP. If a Fiery Sanctum field created by Dehya's own Elemental Skill "Molten Inferno" exists when this ability is unleashed, Dehya will retrieve it, and then create another field once Blazing Lioness's duration expires. This field will take on the retrieved field's duration at the moment of its retrieval. In this state, Dehya will be unable to cast her Elemental Skill, or perform Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks. "Normal Attack: Sandstorm Assault" and Elemental Skill "Molten Inferno" will be replaced by "Roaring Barrage." Roaring Barrage Unleashing Roaring Barrage within 0.4s after each Flame-Mane's Fist strike will increase the speed at which the next Flame-Mane's Fist strike will be triggered.

talents.name: Unstinting Succor
talents.desc:
Within 6 seconds after Dehya retrieves the Fiery Sanctum field through <color=skill>Molten Inferno</color>: Ranging Flame or <color=skill>Leonine Bite</color>, she will take 60% less DMG when receiving DMG from Redmane's Blood. This effect can be triggered once every 2s.
Additionally, within 9s after Dehya unleashes Molten Inferno: Indomitable Flame, she will grant all party members the Gold-Forged Form state. This state will further increase a character's resistance to interruption when they are within the Fiery Sanctum field. Gold-Forged Form can be activated once every 18s.

talents.name: Stalwart and True
talents.desc: When her HP is less than 40%, Dehya will recover 20% of her Max HP and will restore 6% of her Max HP every 2s for the next 10s. This effect can be triggered once every 20s.

talents.name: The Sunlit Way
talents.desc:
Increases the Movement SPD of your own party members by 10% during the day (6:00 – 18:00).
Does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, or Spiral Abyss. Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: The Flame Incandescent
constellations.desc:
Dehya's Max HP is increased by 20%, and she deals bonus DMG based on her Max HP when using the following attacks:
● <color=skill>Molten Inferno</color>'s DMG will be increased by 3.6% of her Max HP.
● <color=skill>Leonine Bite</color>'s DMG will be increased by 6% of her Max HP.

constellations.name: The Sand-Blades Glittering
constellations.desc:
When Dehya uses <color=skill>Molten Inferno</color>: Ranging Flame, the duration of the recreated Fiery Sanctum field will be increased by 4s.
Additionally, when a Fiery Sanctum exists on the field, DMG dealt by its next coordinated attack will be increased by 50% when active character(s) within the Fiery Sanctum field are attacked.

constellations.name: A Rage Swift as Fire
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Leonine Bite</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: An Oath Abiding
constellations.desc: When Flame-Mane's Fist and Incineration Drive attacks unleashed during <color=skill>Leonine Bite</color> hit opponents, they will restore 1.5 Energy for Dehya and 2.5% of her Max HP. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s.

constellations.name: The Alpha Unleashed
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Molten Inferno</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Burning Claws Cleaving
constellations.desc:
The CRIT Rate of <color=skill>Leonine Bite</color> is increased by 10%.
Additionally, after a Flame-Mane's Fist attack hits an opponent and deals CRIT Hits during a single Blazing Lioness state, it will cause the CRIT DMG of Leonine Bite to increase by 15% for the rest of Blazing Lioness's duration and extend that duration by 0.5s. This effect can be triggered every 0.2s. The duration can be extended for a maximum of 2s and CRIT DMG can be increased by a maximum of 60% this way.

talents.name: Tempered Sword
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Searing Onslaught
talents.desc:
Performs a forward slash that deals <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color>.

This skill can be consecutively used 3 times. Enters CD if not cast again within a short period.

talents.name: Dawn
talents.desc:
Releases intense flames to knock back nearby opponents, dealing <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color>.
The flames then converge into the weapon, summoning a Phoenix that flies forward and deals massive <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> to all opponents in its path. The Phoenix explodes upon reaching its destination, causing a large amount of <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.
The searing flames that run down his blade cause it to be infused with <color=pyro>Pyro</color>.

talents.name: Relentless
talents.desc: Diluc's Charged Attack Stamina Cost is decreased by 50%, and its duration is increased by 3s.

talents.name: Blessing of Phoenix
talents.desc: The <color=pyro>Pyro</color> Infusion provided by <color=skill>Dawn</color> lasts for 4s longer. Additionally, Diluc gains 20% <color=pyro>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> during the duration of this effect.

talents.name: Tradition of the Dawn Knight
talents.desc: Refunds 15% of the ores used when Forging Claymore-type weapons.

constellations.name: Conviction
constellations.desc: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.

constellations.name: Searing Ember
constellations.desc:
When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s.
This effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

constellations.name: Fire and Steel
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Searing Onslaught</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flowing Flame
constellations.desc:
Casting <color=skill>Searing Onslaught</color> in rhythm greatly increases damage dealt.
2s after casting <color=skill>Searing Onslaught</color>, casting the next <color=skill>Searing Onslaught</color> in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for 2s.

constellations.name: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Dawn</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of the Dark
constellations.desc:
After casting <color=skill>Searing Onslaught</color>, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%.
Additionally, <color=skill>Searing Onslaught</color> will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.

talents.name: Favonius Bladework - Edel
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Icetide Vortex
talents.desc: Sharp frost, swift blade. Press Slashes swiftly, dealing Cryo DMG. When it hits an opponent, Eula gains a stack of Grimheart that stacks up to 2 times. These stacks can only be gained once every 0.3s. Grimheart Increases Eula's resistance to interruption and DEF. Hold Wielding her sword, Eula consumes all the stacks of Grimheart and lashes forward, dealing AoE Cryo DMG to opponents in front of her. If Grimheart stacks are consumed, surrounding opponents will have their Physical RES and Cryo RES decreased. Each consumed stack of Grimheart will be converted into an Icewhirl Brand that deals Cryo DMG to nearby opponents.

talents.name: Glacial Illumination
talents.desc:
Brandishes her greatsword, dealing <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> to nearby opponents and creating a Lightfall Sword that follows her around for a duration of up to 7s.
While present, the Lightfall Sword increases Eula's resistance to interruption. When Eula's own Normal Attack, Elemental Skill, and Elemental Burst deal DMG to opponents, they will charge the Lightfall Sword, which can gain an energy stack once every 0.1s.
Once its duration ends, the Lightfall Sword will descend and explode violently, dealing Physical DMG to nearby opponents.
This DMG scales on the number of energy stacks the Lightfall Sword has accumulated.
If Eula leaves the field, the Lightfall Sword will explode immediately.

talents.name: Roiling Rime
talents.desc: If 2 stacks of Grimheart are consumed upon unleashing the Holding Mode of <color=skill>Icetide Vortex</color>, a Shattered Lightfall Sword will be created that will explode immediately, dealing 50% of the basic Physical DMG dealt by a Lightfall Sword created by <color=skill>Glacial Illumination</color>.

talents.name: Wellspring of War-Lust
talents.desc: When <color=skill>Glacial Illumination</color> is cast, the CD of <color=skill>Icetide Vortex</color> is reset and Eula gains 1 stack of Grimheart.

talents.name: Aristocratic Introspection
talents.desc: When Eula crafts Character Talent Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Tidal Illusion
constellations.desc:
Every time <color=skill>Icetide Vortex</color>'s Grimheart stacks are consumed, Eula's Physical DMG is increased by 30% for 6s.
Each stack consumed will increase the duration of this effect by 6s up to a maximum of 18s.

constellations.name: Lady of Seafoam
constellations.desc: Decreases the CD of <color=skill>Icetide Vortex</color>'s Holding Mode, rendering it identical to Tapping CD.

constellations.name: Lawrence Pedigree
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Glacial Illumination</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Obstinacy of One's Inferiors
constellations.desc: Lightfall Swords deal 25% increased DMG against opponents with less than 50% HP.

constellations.name: Chivalric Quality
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Icetide Vortex</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Noble Obligation
constellations.desc: Lightfall Swords created by <color=skill>Glacial Illumination</color> start with 5 stacks of energy. Normal Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts have a 50% chance to grant the Lightfall Sword an additional stack of energy.

talents.name: Liutian Archery
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, an icy aura will accumulate on the arrowhead before the arrow is fired. Has different effects based on how long the energy has been charged: ● Charge Level 1: Fires off an icy arrow that deals Cryo DMG. ● Charge Level 2: Fires off a Frostflake Arrow that deals Cryo DMG. The Frostflake Arrow blooms after hitting its target, dealing AoE Cryo DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Trail of the Qilin
talents.desc: Leaving a single Ice Lotus behind, Ganyu dashes backward, shunning all impurity and dealing AoE Cryo DMG. Ice Lotus ● Continuously taunts surrounding opponents, attracting them to attack it. ● Endurance scales based on Ganyu's Max HP. ● Blooms profusely when destroyed or once its duration ends, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

talents.name: Celestial Shower
talents.desc:
Coalesces atmospheric frost and snow to summon a Sacred <color=cryo>Cryo</color> Pearl that exorcises evil.
During its ability duration, the Sacred <color=cryo>Cryo</color> Pearl will continuously rain down shards of ice, striking opponents within an AoE and dealing <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color>.

talents.name: Undivided Heart
talents.desc: After firing a Frostflake Arrow, the CRIT Rate of subsequent Frostflake Arrows and their resulting bloom effects is increased by 20% for 5s.

talents.name: Harmony between Heaven and Earth
talents.desc: <color=skill>Celestial Shower</color> grants a 20% <color=cryo>Cryo DMG Bonus</color> to active members in the AoE.

talents.name: Preserved for the Hunt
talents.desc: Refunds 15% of the ores used when Forging Bow-type weapons.

constellations.name: Dew-Drinker
constellations.desc:
Taking DMG from a Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow or Frostflake Arrow Bloom decreases opponents' <color=cryo>Cryo RES</color> by 15% for 6s.
A hit regenerates 2 Energy for Ganyu. This effect can only occur once per Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow, regardless if Frostflake Arrow itself or its Bloom hit the target.

constellations.name: The Auspicious
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Trail of the Qilin</color> gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Cloud-Strider
constellations.desc:
