Increases the Level of <color=skill>Celestial Shower</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Westward Sojourn
constellations.desc:
Opponents standing within the AoE of <color=skill>Celestial Shower</color> take increased DMG. This effect strengthens over time.
Increased DMG taken begins at 5% and increases by 5% every 3s, up to a maximum of 25%.
The effect lingers for 3s after the opponent leaves the AoE.

constellations.name: The Merciful
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Trail of the Qilin</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Clement
constellations.desc: Using <color=skill>Trail of the Qilin</color> causes the next Frostflake Arrow shot within 30s to not require charging.

talents.name: Secret Spear of Wangsheng
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to six consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Guide to Afterlife
talents.desc: Only an unwavering flame can cleanse the impurities of this world. Hu Tao consumes a set portion of her HP to knock the surrounding enemies back and enter the Paramita Papilio state. Paramita Papilio ● Increases Hu Tao's ATK based on her Max HP at the time of entering this state. ATK Bonus gained this way cannot exceed 400% of Hu Tao's Base ATK. ● Converts attack DMG to Pyro DMG, which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion. ● Charged Attacks apply the Blood Blossom effect to the enemies hit. ● Increases Hu Tao's resistance to interruption. Blood Blossom Enemies affected by Blood Blossom will take Pyro DMG every 4s. This DMG is considered Elemental Skill DMG. Each enemy can be affected by only one Blood Blossom effect at a time, and its duration may only be refreshed by Hu Tao herself. Paramita Papilio ends when its duration is over, or Hu Tao has left the battlefield or fallen.

talents.name: Spirit Soother
talents.desc:
Commands a blazing spirit to attack, dealing <color=pyro>Pyro DMG</color> in a large AoE.
Upon striking the enemy, regenerates a percentage of Hu Tao's Max HP. This effect can be triggered up to 5 times, based on the number of enemies hit.
If Hu Tao's HP is below or equal to 50% when the enemy is hit, both the DMG and HP Regeneration are increased.

talents.name: Flutter By
talents.desc: When a Paramita Papilio state activated by Guide to Afterlife ends, all allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 8s.

talents.name: Sanguine Rouge
talents.desc: When Hu Tao's HP is equal to or less than 50%, her <color=pyro>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> is increased by 33%.

talents.name: The More the Merrier
talents.desc: When Hu Tao cooks a dish perfectly, she has a 18% chance to receive an additional "Suspicious" dish of the same type.

constellations.name: Crimson Bouquet
constellations.desc: While in a Paramita Papilio state activated by Guide to Afterlife, Hu Tao's Charge Attacks [sic] do not consume Stamina.

constellations.name: Ominous Rainfall
constellations.desc: Increases the Blood Blossom DMG by an amount equal to 10% of Hu Tao's Max HP at the time the effect is applied. Additionally, Spirit Soother will also apply the Blood Blossom effect.

constellations.name: Lingering Carmine
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Guide to Afterlife</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Garden of Eternal Rest
constellations.desc: Upon defeating an enemy affected by a Blood Blossom that Hu Tao applied herself, all nearby allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 15s.

constellations.name: Floral Incense
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Spirit Soother</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Butterfly's Embrace
constellations.desc:
Triggers when Hu Tao's HP drops below 25%, or when she suffers a lethal strike:
Hu Tao will not fall as a result of the DMG sustained. Additionally, for the next 10s, all of her Elemental and Physical RES is increased by 200%, her CRIT Rate is increased by 100%, and her resistance to interruption is greatly increased.
This effect triggers automatically when Hu Tao has 1 HP left.
Can only occur once every 60s.

talents.name: Favonius Bladework
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of stamina to launch an opponent using the power of wind. Launched opponents will slowly fall to the ground. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Gale Blade
talents.desc: Focusing the might of the formless wind around her blade, Jean releases a miniature storm, launching opponents in the direction she aims at, dealing massive Anemo DMG. Hold At the cost of continued stamina consumption, Jean can command the whirlwind to pull surrounding opponents and objects towards her front. Direction can be adjusted. Character is immobile during skill duration.

talents.name: Dandelion Breeze
talents.desc: Calling upon the wind's protection, Jean creates a swirling Dandelion Field, launching surrounding opponents and dealing Anemo DMG. At the same time, she instantly regenerates a large amount of HP for all party members. The amount of HP restored scales off Jean's ATK. Dandelion Field ● Continuously regenerates HP of characters within the AoE and continuously imbues them with Anemo. ● Deals Anemo DMG to opponents entering or exiting the Dandelion Field.

talents.name: Wind Companion
talents.desc: Hits by Jean's Normal Attacks have a 50% chance to regenerate HP equal to 15% of Jean's ATK for all party members.

talents.name: Let the Wind Lead
talents.desc: Using <color=skill>Dandelion Breeze</color> will regenerate 20% of its Energy.

talents.name: Guiding Breeze
talents.desc: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, Jean has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Spiraling Tempest
constellations.desc: Increases the pulling speed of <color=skill>Gale Blade</color> after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

constellations.name: People's Aegis
constellations.desc: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

constellations.name: When the West Wind Arises
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Dandelion Breeze</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lands of Dandelion
constellations.desc: Within the Field created by <color=skill>Dandelion Breeze</color>, all opponents have their <color=anemo>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 40%.

constellations.name: Outbursting Gust
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Gale Blade</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
constellations.desc: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by <color=skill>Dandelion Breeze</color>. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.

talents.name: Garyuu Bladework
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact. If this Plunging Attack is triggered by Chihayaburu, it will be converted to Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan. Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan When a Plunging Attack is performed using the effects of the Elemental Skill Chihayaburu, Plunging Attack DMG is converted to Anemo DMG and will create a small wind tunnel via a secret blade technique that pulls in nearby objects and opponents.

talents.name: Chihayaburu
talents.desc: Unleashes a secret technique as fierce as the rushing wind that pulls objects and opponents towards Kazuha's current position before launching opponents within the AoE, dealing Anemo DMG and lifting Kazuha into the air on a rushing gust of wind. Within 10s of remaining airborne after casting Chihayaburu, Kazuha can unleash a powerful Plunging Attack known as Midare Ranzan. Press Can be used in mid-air. Hold Charges up before unleashing greater Anemo DMG over a larger AoE than Press Mode. Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan When a Plunging Attack is performed using the effects of the Elemental Skill Chihayaburu, Plunging Attack DMG is converted to Anemo DMG. On landing, Kazuha creates a small wind tunnel via a secret blade technique that pulls in nearby objects and opponents. Midare Ranzan's DMG is considered Plunging Attack DMG.

talents.name: Kazuha Slash
talents.desc: The signature technique of Kazuha's self-styled bladework — a single slash that strikes with the force of the first winds of autumn, dealing AoE Anemo DMG. The blade's passage will leave behind a field named "Autumn Whirlwind" that periodically deals AoE Anemo DMG to opponents within its range. Elemental Absorption If Autumn Whirlwind comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

talents.name: Soumon Swordsmanship
talents.desc:
If <color=skill>Chihayaburu</color> comes into contact with <color=hydro>Hydro</color>/<color=pyro>Pyro</color>/<color=cryo>Cryo</color>/<color=electro>Electro</color> when cast, <color=skill>Chihayaburu</color> will absorb that element and if Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan is used before the effect expires, it will deal an additional 200% ATK of the absorbed elemental type as DMG. This will be considered Plunging Attack DMG.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use of <color=skill>Chihayaburu</color>.

talents.name: Poetics of Fuubutsu
talents.desc: Upon triggering a Swirl reaction, Kaedehara Kazuha will grant all party members a 0.04% Elemental DMG Bonus to the element absorbed by Swirl for every point of Elemental Mastery he has for 8s. Bonuses for different elements obtained through this method can co-exist.

talents.name: Cloud Strider
talents.desc:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Scarlet Hills
constellations.desc:
Decreases <color=skill>Chihayaburu</color>'s CD by 10%.
Using <color=skill>Kazuha Slash</color> resets the CD of <color=skill>Chihayaburu</color>.

constellations.name: Yamaarashi Tailwind
constellations.desc:
The Autumn Whirlwind field created by <color=skill>Kazuha Slash</color> has the following effects:
● Increases Kaedehara Kazuha's own Elemental Mastery by 200 for its duration.
● Increases the Elemental Mastery of characters within the field by 200.

The Elemental Mastery-increasing effects of this Constellation do not stack.

constellations.name: Maple Monogatari
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Chihayaburu</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Oozora Genpou
constellations.desc:
When Kaedehara Kazuha's Energy is lower than 45, he obtains the following effects:
● Pressing or Holding <color=skill>Chihayaburu</color> regenerates 3 or 4 Energy for Kaedehara Kazuha, respectively.
● When gliding, Kaedehara Kazuha regenerates 2 Energy per second.

constellations.name: Wisdom of Bansei
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Kazuha Slash</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Crimson Momiji
constellations.desc: After using <color=skill>Chihayaburu</color> or <color=skill>Kazuha Slash</color>, Kaedehara Kazuha gains an <color=anemo>Anemo</color> Infusion for 5s. Additionally, each point of Elemental Mastery will increase the DMG dealt by Kaedehara Kazuha's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks by 0.2%.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Kabuki
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a flurry of sword ki. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Hyouka
talents.desc: Summons blooming ice to launch nearby opponents, dealing <color=cryo>AoE Cryo DMG</color>.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Soumetsu
talents.desc: Summons forth a snowstorm with flawless poise, unleashing a Frostflake Seki no To that moves forward continuously. Frostflake Seki no To ● A storm of whirling icy winds that slashes repeatedly at every enemy it touches, dealing Cryo DMG. ● The snowstorm explodes after its duration ends, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Senho
talents.desc: Alternate Sprint Ayaka consumes Stamina and cloaks herself in a frozen fog that moves with her. In Senho form, she moves swiftly upon water. When she reappears, the following effects occur: ● Ayaka unleashes frigid energy to apply Cryo on nearby opponents. ● Coldness condenses around Ayaka's blade, infusing her attacks with Cryo for a brief period.

talents.name: Amatsumi Kunitsumi Sanctification
talents.desc: After using <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Hyouka</color>, Kamisato Ayaka's Normal and Charged attacks deal 30% increased DMG for 6s.

talents.name: Kanten Senmyou Blessing
talents.desc:
When the <color=cryo>Cryo</color> application at the end of <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Senho</color> hits an opponent, Kamisato Ayaka gains the following effects:
● Restores 10 Stamina
● Gains 18% <color=cryo>Cryo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.

talents.name: Fruits of Shinsa
talents.desc: When Ayaka crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Snowswept Sakura
constellations.desc: When Kamisato Ayaka's Normal or Charged Attacks deal <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> to opponents, it has a 50% chance of decreasing the CD of <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Hyouka</color> by 0.3s. This effect can occur once every 0.1s.

constellations.name: Blizzard Blade Seki no To
constellations.desc: When casting <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Soumetsu</color>, unleashes 2 smaller additional Frostflake Seki no To, each dealing 20% of the original storm's DMG.

constellations.name: Frostbloom Kamifubuki
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Soumetsu</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Ebb and Flow
constellations.desc: Opponents damaged by <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Soumetsu</color>'s Frostflake Seki no To will have their DEF decreased by 30% for 6s.

constellations.name: Blossom Cloud Irutsuki
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Hyouka</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dance of Suigetsu
constellations.desc: Kamisato Ayaka gains Usurahi Butou every 10s, increasing her <color=skill>Charged Attack</color> DMG by 298%. This buff will be cleared 0.5s after Ayaka's Charged ATK hits an opponent, after which the timer for this ability will restart.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Marobashi
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to dash forward and perform an iai. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Kyouka
talents.desc: Kamisato Ayato shifts positions and enters the Takimeguri Kanka state. After this shift, he will leave a watery illusion at his original location. After it is formed, the watery illusion will explode if opponents are nearby or after its duration ends, dealing AoE Hydro DMG. Takimeguri Kanka In this state, Kamisato Ayato uses his Shunsuiken to engage in blindingly fast attacks, causing DMG from his Normal Attacks to be converted into AoE Hydro DMG. This cannot be overridden. It also has the following properties: ● After a Shunsuiken attack hits an opponent, it will grant Ayato the Namisen effect, increasing the DMG dealt by Shunsuiken based on Ayato's current Max HP. The initial maximum number of Namisen stacks is 4, and 1 stack can be gained through Shunsuiken every 0.1s. This effect will be dispelled when Takimeguri Kanka ends. ● Kamisato Ayato's resistance to interruption is increased. ● Unable to use Charged or Plunging Attacks. Takimeguri Kanka will be cleared when Ayato leaves the field. Using Kamisato Art: Kyouka again while in the Takimeguri Kanka state will reset and replace the pre-existing state.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Suiyuu
talents.desc:
Unveils a garden of purity that silences the cacophony within.
While this space exists, Bloomwater Blades will constantly rain down and attack opponents within its AoE, dealing <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color> and increasing the Normal Attack DMG of characters within.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Mine Wo Matoishi Kiyotaki
talents.desc:
<color=skill>Kamisato Art: Kyouka</color> has the following properties:
● After it is used, Kamisato Ayato will gain 2 Namisen stacks.
● When the water illusion explodes, Ayato will gain a Namisen effect equal to the maximum number of stacks possible.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Michiyuku Hagetsu
talents.desc: If Kamisato Ayato is not on the field and his Energy is less than 40, he will regenerate 2 Energy for himself every second.

talents.name: Kamisato Art: Daily Cooking
talents.desc: When Ayato cooks a dish perfectly, he has a 18% chance to receive an additional "Suspicious" dish of the same type.

constellations.name: Kyouka Fuushi
constellations.desc: Shunsuiken DMG is increased by 40% against opponents with 50% HP or less.

constellations.name: World Source
constellations.desc: Namisen's maximum stack count is increased to 5. When Kamisato Ayato has at least 3 Namisen stacks, his Max HP is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: To Admire the Flowers
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Kyouka</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Endless Flow
constellations.desc: After using <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Suiyuu</color>, all nearby party members will have 15% increased Normal Attack SPD for 15s.

constellations.name: Bansui Ichiro
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Suiyuu</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Boundless Origin
constellations.desc:
After using <color=skill>Kamisato Art: Kyouka</color>, Ayato's next Shunsuiken attack will create 2 extra Shunsuiken strikes when they hit opponents, each one dealing 450% of Ayato's ATK as DMG.
Both these Shunsuiken attacks will not be affected by Namisen.

talents.name: Yunlai Swordsmanship
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Stellar Restoration
talents.desc: Hurls a Lightning Stiletto that annihilates her opponents like the swift thunder. When the Stiletto hits its target, it deals Electro DMG to opponents in a small AoE, and places a Stiletto Mark on the spot hit. Hold Hold to adjust the direction in which the Stiletto shall be thrown. Stilettos thrown by the Hold attack mode can be suspended in mid-air, allowing Keqing to jump to them when using Stellar Restoration a second time. Lightning Stiletto If Keqing uses Stellar Restoration again or uses a Charged Attack while its duration lasts, it will clear the Stiletto Mark and produce different effects: ● If she uses Stellar Restoration again, she will blink to the location of the Mark and unleash one slashing attack that deals AoE Electro DMG. When blinking to a Stiletto that was thrown from a Holding attack, Keqing can leap across obstructing terrain. ● If Keqing uses a Charged Attack, she will ignite a series of thundering cuts at the Mark's location, dealing AoE Electro DMG.

talents.name: Starward Sword
talents.desc:
Keqing unleashes the power of lightning, dealing <color=electro>Electro DMG</color> in an AOE.
She then blends into the shadow of her blade, striking a series of thunderclap-blows to nearby opponents simultaneously that deal multiple instances of <color=electro>Electro DMG</color>.
The final attack deals massive <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Thundering Penance
talents.desc: After recasting <color=skill>Stellar Restoration</color> while a Lightning Stiletto is present, Keqing's weapon gains an <color=electro>Electro</color> Infusion for 5s.

talents.name: Aristocratic Dignity
talents.desc: When casting <color=skill>Starward Sword</color>, Keqing's CRIT Rate is increased by 15%, and her Energy Recharge is increased by 15%. This effect lasts for 8s.

talents.name: Land's Overseer
talents.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Thundering Might
constellations.desc: Recasting <color=skill>Stellar Restoration</color> while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color> at the start point and terminus of her Blink.

constellations.name: Keen Extraction
constellations.desc:
When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents affected by <color=electro>Electro</color>, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Foreseen Reformation
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Starward Sword</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Attunement
constellations.desc: For 10s after Keqing triggers an <color=electro>Electro-related Elemental Reaction</color>, her ATK is increased by 25%.

constellations.name: Beckoning Stars
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Stellar Restoration</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Tenacious Star
constellations.desc:
When initiating a Normal Attack, a Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% <color=electro>Electro DMG Bonus</color> for 8s.
Effects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.

talents.name: Kaboom!
talents.desc: Normal Attack Throws things that go boom when they hit things! Perform up to 3 explosive attacks, dealing AoE Pyro DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Pyro DMG to opponents after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Gathering the power of Pyro, Klee plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Pyro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Jumpy Dumpty
talents.desc:
<color=skill>Jumpy Dumpty</color> is tons of boom-bang-fun!
When thrown, <color=skill>Jumpy Dumpty</color> bounces thrice, igniting and dealing <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color> with every bounce.

On the third bounce, the bomb splits into many mines.
The mines will explode upon contact with opponents, or after a short period of time, dealing <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

Starts with 2 charges.

talents.name: Sparks 'n' Splash
talents.desc: Klee's Blazing Delight! For the duration of this ability, continuously summons <color=skill>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> to attack nearby opponents, dealing <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Pounding Surprise
talents.desc: When <color=skill>Jumpy Dumpty</color> and Normal Attacks deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark. This Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Charged Attack, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.

talents.name: Sparkling Burst
talents.desc: When Klee's Charged Attack results in a CRIT, all party members gain 2 Elemental Energy.

talents.name: All Of My Treasures!
talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Mondstadt on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Chained Reactions
constellations.desc: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of <color=skill>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>'s DMG.

constellations.name: Explosive Frags
constellations.desc: Being hit by <color=skill>Jumpy Dumpty</color>'s mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.

constellations.name: Exquisite Compound
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Jumpy Dumpty</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sparkly Explosion
constellations.desc: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of <color=skill>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as <color=pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

constellations.name: Nova Burst
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Blazing Delight
constellations.desc:
While under the effects of <color=skill>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.
When <color=skill>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> is used, all party members will gain a 10% <color=pyro>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> for 25s.

talents.name: Ripple of Fate
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Gathering the might of Hydro, Mona plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Mirror Reflection of Doom
talents.desc: Creates an illusory Phantom of Fate from coalesced waterspouts. The Phantom has the following special properties: ● Continuously taunts nearby opponents, attracting their fire. ● Continuously deals Hydro DMG to nearby opponents. ● When its duration expires, the Phantom explodes, dealing AoE Hydro DMG. Hold Utilizes water currents to move backwards swiftly before conjuring a Phantom. Only one Phantom created by Mirror Reflection of Doom can exist at any time.

talents.name: Stellaris Phantasm
talents.desc: Mona summons the sparkling waves and creates a reflection of the starry sky, applying the Illusory Bubble status to opponents in a large AoE. Illusory Bubble Traps opponents inside a pocket of destiny and also makes them Wet. Renders weaker opponents immobile. When an opponent affected by Illusory Bubble sustains DMG, it has the following effects: ● Applies an Omen to the opponent, which gives a DMG Bonus, also increasing the DMG of the attack that causes it. ● Removes the Illusory Bubble, dealing Hydro DMG in the process. Omen During its duration, increases DMG taken by opponents.

talents.name: Illusory Torrent
talents.desc: Alternate Sprint Mona cloaks herself within the water's flow, consuming stamina to move rapidly. When under the effect of Illusory Torrent, Mona can move at high speed on water. Applies the Wet status to nearby opponents when she reappears.

talents.name: "Come 'n' Get Me, Hag!"
talents.desc:
After she has used <color=skill>Illusory Torrent</color> for 2s, if there are any opponents nearby, Mona will automatically create a Phantom.
A Phantom created in this manner lasts for 2s, and its explosion DMG is equal to 50% of <color=skill>Mirror Reflection of Doom</color>.

talents.name: Waterborne Destiny
talents.desc: Increases Mona's <color=hydro>Hydro DMG Bonus</color> by a degree equivalent to 20% of her Energy Recharge rate.

talents.name: Principium of Astrology
talents.desc: When Mona crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 25% chance to refund one count of one material out of all the crafting materials used.

constellations.name: Prophecy of Submersion
constellations.desc:
When any of your own party members hits an opponent affected by an Omen, the effects of <color=hydro>Hydro-related Elemental Reactions</color> are enhanced for 8s:
● <color=electro>Electro-Charged DMG</color> increases by 15%.
● Vaporize DMG increases by 15%.
● <color=hydro>Hydro</color> Swirl DMG increases by 15%.
● Frozen duration is extended by 15%.

constellations.name: Lunar Chain
constellations.desc:
When a Normal Attack hits, there is a 20% chance that it will be automatically followed by a Charged Attack.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Restless Revolution
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Stellaris Phantasm</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Prophecy of Oblivion
constellations.desc: When any party member attacks an opponent affected by an Omen, their CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Mockery of Fortuna
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Mirror Reflection of Doom</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rhetorics of Calamitas
constellations.desc:
Upon entering <color=skill>Illusory Torrent</color>, Mona gains a 60% increase to the DMG of her next Charged Attack per second of movement.
A maximum DMG Bonus of 180% can be achieved in this manner. The effect lasts for no more than 8s.

talents.name: Akara
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 attacks that deal Dendro DMG to opponents in front of her. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Dendro DMG to opponents in front of her after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Calling upon the might of Dendro, Nahida plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Dendro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: All Schemes to Know
talents.desc: Sends forth karmic bonds of wood and tree from her side, dealing AoE Dendro DMG and marking up to 8 opponents hit with the Seed of Skandha. When held, this skill will trigger differently. Hold Enters Aiming Mode, which will allow you to select a limited number of opponents within a limited area. During this time, Nahida's resistance to interruption will be increased. When released, this skill deals Dendro DMG to these opponents and marks them with the Seed of Skandha. Aiming Mode will last up to 5s and can select a maximum of 8 opponents. Seed of Skandha Opponents who have been marked by the Seed of Skandha will be linked to one another up till a certain distance. After you trigger Elemental Reactions on opponents who are affected by the Seeds of Skandha or when they take DMG from Dendro Cores (including Burgeon and Hyperbloom DMG), Nahida will unleash Tri-Karma Purification on the opponents and all connected opponents, dealing Dendro DMG based on her ATK and Elemental Mastery. You can trigger at most 1 Tri-Karma Purification within a short period of time. Lo, the god of grass and trees shines her ultimate truth into the void, illuminating the origin and destruction of the three karmas.

talents.name: Illusory Heart
talents.desc: Manifests the Court of Dreams and expands the Shrine of Maya. When the Shrine of Maya field is unleashed, the following effects will be separately unleashed based on the Elemental Types present within the party. ● Pyro: While Nahida remains within the Shrine of Maya, the DMG dealt by Tri-Karma Purification from "All Schemes to Know" is increased. ● Electro: While Nahida remains within the Shrine of Maya, the interval between each Tri-Karma Purification from "All Schemes to Know" is decreased. ● Hydro: The Shrine of Maya's duration is increased. If there are at least 2 party members of the aforementioned Elemental Types present when the field is deployed, the aforementioned effects will be increased further. Even if Nahida is not on the field, these bonuses will still take effect so long as party members are within the Shrine of Maya. Perhaps all that dwell under the bowers of trees are naught but a fleeting upside-down dream in the eyes of the God of Wisdom.

talents.name: Compassion Illuminated
talents.desc:
When unleashing <color=skill>Illusory Heart</color>, the Shrine of Maya will gain the following effects:
The Elemental Mastery of the active character within the field will be increased by 25% of the Elemental Mastery of the party member with the highest Elemental Mastery.
You can gain a maximum of 250 Elemental Mastery in this manner.

talents.name: Awakening Elucidated
talents.desc:
Each point of Nahida's Elemental Mastery beyond 200 will grant 0.1% Bonus DMG and 0.03% CRIT Rate to Tri-Karma Purification from <color=skill>All Schemes to Know</color>.
A maximum of 80% Bonus DMG and 24% CRIT Rate can be granted to Tri-Karma Purification in this manner.

talents.name: On All Things Meditated
talents.desc:
Nahida can use <color=skill>All Schemes to Know</color> to interact with some harvestable items within a fixed AoE.
This skill may even have some other effects...

constellations.name: The Seed of Stored Knowledge
constellations.desc: When the <color=skill>Shrine of Maya</color> is unleashed and the Elemental Types of the party members are being tabulated, the count will add 1 to the number of Pyro, Electro, and Hydro characters respectively.

constellations.name: The Root of All Fullness
constellations.desc:
Opponents that are marked by <color=skill>Seeds of Skandha</color> applied by Nahida herself will be affected by the following effects:
● Burning, Bloom, Hyperbloom, and Burgeon Reaction DMG can score CRIT Hits. CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG are fixed at 20% and 100% respectively.
● Within 8s of being affected by Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, DEF is decreased by 30%.

constellations.name: The Shoot of Conscious Attainment
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>All Schemes to Know</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Stem of Manifest Inference
constellations.desc: When 1/2/3/(4 or more) nearby opponents are affected by <color=skill>All Schemes to Know</color>'s Seeds of Skandha, Nahida's Elemental Mastery will be increased by 100/120/140/160.

constellations.name: The Leaves of Enlightening Speech
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Illusory Heart</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Fruit of Reason's Culmination
constellations.desc:
When Nahida hits an opponent affected by <color=skill>All Schemes to Know</color>'s Seeds of Skandha with Normal or Charged Attacks after unleashing <color=skill>Illusory Heart</color>, she will use Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion on this opponent and all connected opponents, dealing <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color> based on 200% of Nahida's ATK and 400% of her Elemental Mastery.
DMG dealt by Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion is considered Elemental Skill DMG and can be triggered once every 0.2s.
This effect can last up to 10s and will be removed after Nahida has unleashed 6 instances of Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion.

talents.name: Dance of Samser
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 3 consecutive sword strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform a twirling slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Dance of Haftkarsvar
talents.desc:
Nilou will enter the Pirouette state, dealing <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color> to nearby opponents based on her Max HP. While she is in the Pirouette state, Nilou's Normal Attacks and Elemental Attacks will cause her to enter the Sword Dance and Whirling Steps stances respectively, causing DMG she deals to be converted to <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color> that cannot be overridden and that is considered Elemental Skill DMG. In these stances, Nilou's third dance step will end Pirouette, and has the following effects:
● Sword Dance: unleashes a Luminous Illusion that deals <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color> to opponents it touches and grants Nilou the Lunar Prayer effect. This effect converts Nilou's Normal Attacks into Sword Dance techniques, and her final hit will unleash a Luminous Illusion.
● Whirling Steps: Nilou unleashes a Whirling Water Wheel that deals <color=hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</color> and creates a Tranquility Aura that follows your active character around and applies <color=hydro>Wet</color> to opponents within its AoE.
Nilou is unable to perform Charged Attacks when under the effect of Pirouette or Lunar Prayer. These effects will be removed once she leaves the field.

talents.name: Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring
talents.desc: Begins the dance of faraway dreams and springs that hear, causing a Lotus of Distant Waters to bloom, dealing <color=hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</color> based on Nilou's Max HP and applying the Lingering Aeon effect to all opponents hit. After an interval, opponents affected by Lingering Aeon will take <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color>.

talents.name: Court of Dancing Petals
talents.desc:
When all characters in the party are all <color=dendro>Dendro</color> or <color=hydro>Hydro</color>, and there are at least one <color=dendro>Dendro</color> character and one <color=hydro>Hydro</color> character:
The completion of the third dance step of Nilou's <color=skill>Dance of Haftkarsvar</color> will grant all nearby characters the Golden Chalice's Bounty for 30s.
Characters under the effect of Golden Chalice's Bounty will increase the Elemental Mastery of all nearby characters by 100 for 10s whenever they are hit by <color=dendro>Dendro</color> attacks. Also, triggering the Bloom reaction will create Bountiful Cores instead of <color=dendro>Dendro</color> Cores.
Such Cores will burst very quickly after being created, and they have larger AoEs.
Bountiful Cores cannot trigger Hyperbloom or Burgeon, and they share an upper numerical limit with <color=dendro>Dendro</color> Cores. Bountiful Core DMG is considered DMG dealt by <color=dendro>Dendro</color> Cores produced by Bloom.
Should the party not meet the conditions for this Passive Talent, any existing Golden Chalice's Bounty effects will be canceled.

talents.name: Dreamy Dance of Aeons
talents.desc:
Every 1,000 points of Nilou's Max HP above 30,000 will cause the DMG dealt by Bountiful Cores created by characters affected by Golden Chalice's Bounty to increase by 9%.
The maximum increase in Bountiful Core DMG that can be achieved this way is 400%.

talents.name: White Jade Lotus
talents.desc: When Perfect Cooking is achieved on Food with Adventure-related effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Dance of the Waning Moon
constellations.desc:
<color=skill>Dance of Haftkarsvar</color> will be enhanced as follows:
● Luminous Illusion DMG is increased by 65%.
● The Tranquility Aura's duration is extended by 6s.

constellations.name: The Starry Skies Their Flowers Rain
constellations.desc:
After characters affected by the Golden Chalice's Bounty deal <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color> to an opponent, that opponent's <color=hydro>Hydro RES</color> will be decreased by 35% for 10s. After a triggered Bloom reaction deals DMG to opponents, their <color=dendro>Dendro RES</color> will be decreased by 35% for 10s.
You need to have unlocked the "<color=skill>Court of Dancing Petals</color>" Talent.

constellations.name: Beguiling Shadowstep
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Fricative Pulse
constellations.desc: After the third dance step of <color=skill>Dance of Haftkarsvar</color>'s Pirouette hits opponents, Nilou will gain 15 Elemental Energy, and DMG from her <color=skill>Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring</color> will be increased by 50% for 8s.

constellations.name: Twirling Light
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Dance of Haftkarsvar</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frostbreaker's Melody
constellations.desc:
For every 1,000 points of Max HP, Nilou's CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG will increase by 0.6% and 1.2% respectively.
The maximum increase in CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG via this method is 30% and 60% respectively.

talents.name: Ancient Sword Art
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 5 rapid strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost
talents.desc: Using the Icevein Talisman, Qiqi brings forth the Herald of Frost, dealing Cryo DMG to surrounding opponents. Herald of Frost ● On hit, Qiqi's Normal and Charged Attacks regenerate HP for your own party members and nearby teammates. Healing scales based on Qiqi's ATK. ● Periodically regenerates your active character's HP. ● Follows the character around, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents in their path.

talents.name: Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune
talents.desc: Qiqi releases the adeptus power sealed within her body, marking nearby opponents with a Fortune-Preserving Talisman that deals Cryo DMG. Fortune-Preserving Talisman When opponents affected by this Talisman take DMG, the character that dealt this DMG regenerates HP.

talents.name: Life-Prolonging Methods
talents.desc: When a character under the effects of <color=skill>Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost</color> triggers an Elemental Reaction, their Incoming Healing Bonus is increased by 20% for 8s.

talents.name: A Glimpse Into Arcanum
talents.desc: When Qiqi hits opponents with her Normal and Charged Attacks, she has a 50% chance to apply a Fortune-Preserving Talisman to them for 6s. This effect can only occur once every 30s.

talents.name: Former Life Memories
talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Liyue on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Ascetics of Frost
constellations.desc: When the Herald of Frost hits an opponent marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.

constellations.name: Frozen to the Bone
constellations.desc: Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against opponents affected by <color=cryo>Cryo</color> is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Ascendant Praise
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Divine Suppression
constellations.desc: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.

constellations.name: Crimson Lotus Bloom
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rite of Resurrection
constellations.desc:
Using <color=skill>Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune</color> revives all fallen party members nearby and regenerates 50% of their HP.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

talents.name: Origin
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward slash. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Transcendence: Baleful Omen
talents.desc: The Raiden Shogun unveils a shard of her Euthymia, dealing Electro DMG to nearby opponents, and granting nearby party members the Eye of Stormy Judgment. Eye of Stormy Judgment ● When characters with this buff attack and deal DMG to opponents, the Eye will unleash a coordinated attack, dealing AoE Electro DMG at the opponent's position. ● Characters who gain the Eye of Stormy Judgment will have their Elemental Burst DMG increased based on the Energy Cost of the Elemental Burst during the Eye's duration. The Eye can initiate one coordinated attack every 0.9s per party. Coordinated attacks generated by characters not controlled by you deal 20% of the normal DMG.

talents.name: Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu
talents.desc: Gathering truths unnumbered and wishes uncounted, the Raiden Shogun unleashes the Musou no Hitotachi and deals AoE Electro DMG, using Musou Isshin in combat for a certain duration afterward. The DMG dealt by Musou no Hitotachi and Musou Isshin's attacks will be increased based on the number of Chakra Desiderata's Resolve stacks consumed when this skill is used. Musou Isshin While in this state, the Raiden Shogun will wield her tachi in battle, while her Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks will be infused with Electro DMG, which cannot be overridden. When such attacks hit opponents, she will regenerate Energy for all nearby party members. Energy can be restored this way once every 1s, and this effect can be triggered 5 times throughout this skill's duration. While in this state, the Raiden Shogun's resistance to interruption is increased, and she is immune to Electro-Charged reaction DMG. While Musou Isshin is active, the Raiden Shogun's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG will be considered Elemental Burst DMG. The effects of Musou Isshin will be cleared when the Raiden Shogun leaves the field. Chakra Desiderata When nearby party members (excluding the Raiden Shogun herself) use their Elemental Bursts, the Raiden Shogun will build up Resolve stacks based on the Energy Cost of these Elemental Bursts. The maximum number of Resolve stacks is 60. The Resolve gained by Chakra Desiderata will be cleared 300s after the Raiden Shogun leaves the field.

talents.name: Wishes Unnumbered
talents.desc:
When nearby party members gain Elemental Orbs or Particles, Chakra Desiderata gains 2 Resolve stacks.
This effect can occur once every 3s.

talents.name: Enlightened One
talents.desc:
Each 1% above 100% Energy Recharge that the Raiden Shogun possesses grants her:
● 0.6% greater Energy restoration from Musou Isshin
● 0.4% <color=electro>Electro DMG Bonus</color>.

talents.name: All-Preserver
talents.desc: Mora expended when ascending Swords and Polearms is decreased by 50%.

constellations.name: Ominous Inscription
constellations.desc: Chakra Desiderata will gather Resolve even faster. When <color=electro>Electro</color> characters use their Elemental Bursts, the Resolve gained is increased by 80%. When characters of other Elemental Types use their Elemental Bursts, the Resolve gained is increased by 20%.

constellations.name: Steelbreaker
constellations.desc: While using Musou no Hitotachi and in the Musou Isshin state applied by <color=skill>Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu</color>, the Raiden Shogun's attacks ignore 60% of opponents's DEF.

constellations.name: Shinkage Bygones
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Pledge of Propriety
constellations.desc: When the Musou Isshin state applied by <color=skill>Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu</color> expires, all nearby party members (excluding the Raiden Shogun) gain 30% bonus ATK for 10s.

constellations.name: Shogun's Descent
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Transcendence: Baleful Omen</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wishbearer
constellations.desc:
While in the Musou Isshin state applied by <color=skill>Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu</color>, attacks by the Raiden Shogun that are considered part of her Elemental Burst will decrease all nearby party members' (but not including the Raiden Shogun herself) Elemental Burst CD by 1s when they hit opponents.
This effect can trigger once every 1s, and can trigger a total of 5 times during the state's duration.

talents.name: The Shape of Water
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 3 consecutive attacks that take the form of swimming fish, dealing Hydro DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Gathering the might of Hydro, Kokomi plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Kurage's Oath
talents.desc: Summons a "Bake-Kurage" created from water that can heal her allies. Using this skill will apply the Wet status to Sangonomiya Kokomi. Bake-Kurage Deals Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and heal nearby active characters at fixed intervals. This healing is based on Kokomi's Max HP.

talents.name: Nereid's Ascension
talents.desc: Summons the might of Watatsumi, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents, before robing Kokomi in a Ceremonial Garment made from the flowing waters of Sangonomiya. Ceremonial Garment ● Sangonomiya Kokomi's Normal Attack, Charged Attack and Bake-Kurage DMG are increased based on her Max HP. ● When her Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents, Kokomi will restore HP for all nearby party members, and the amount restored is based on her Max HP. ● Increases Sangonomiya Kokomi's resistance to interruption and allows her to walk on the water's surface. These effects will be cleared once Sangonomiya Kokomi leaves the field.

talents.name: Tamanooya's Casket
talents.desc: If Sangonomiya Kokomi's own Bake-Kurage are on the field when she uses <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color>, the Bake-Kurage's duration will be refreshed.

talents.name: Song of Pearls
talents.desc: While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color>, the Normal and Charged Attack DMG Bonus Sangonomiya Kokomi gains based on her Max HP will receive a further increase based on 15% of her Healing Bonus.

talents.name: Princess of Watatsumi
talents.desc:
Decreases swimming Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: At Water's Edge
constellations.desc:
While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color>, the final Normal Attack in Sangonomiya Kokomi's combo will unleash a swimming fish to deal 30% of her Max HP as <color=hydro>Hydro DMG</color>.
This DMG is not considered Normal Attack DMG.

constellations.name: The Clouds Like Waves Rippling
constellations.desc:
Sangonomiya Kokomi gains the following Healing Bonuses with regard to characters with 50% or less HP via the following methods:
● <color=skill>Kurage's Oath</color> Bake-Kurage: 4.5% of Kokomi's Max HP.
● <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color> Normal and Charged Attacks: 0.6% of Kokomi's Max HP.

constellations.name: The Moon, A Ship O'er the Seas
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Moon Overlooks the Waters
constellations.desc:
While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color>, Sangonomiya Kokomi's Normal Attack SPD is increased by 10%, and Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.8 Energy for her.
This effect can occur once every 0.2s.

constellations.name: All Streams Flow to the Sea
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Kurage's Oath</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sango Isshin
constellations.desc: While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=skill>Nereid's Ascension</color>, Sangonomiya Kokomi gains a 40% <color=hydro>Hydro DMG Bonus</color> for 4s when her Normal and Charged Attacks heal, or would heal, any party member with 80% or more HP.

talents.name: Dawnstar Piercer
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Spring Spirit Summoning
talents.desc: The frosted dew, silvery and dense, shall exorcise all demons. Grants all nearby party members the Icy Quill effect and deals Cryo DMG in different ways based on whether it is pressed or held. Press Rushes forward together with a Talisman Spirit, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents along the path. Hold Commands the Talisman Spirit to deal AoE Cryo DMG. Icy Quill When Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts deal Cryo DMG to opponents, the DMG dealt is increased based on Shenhe's current ATK. The Icy Quill's effects will be cleared once its duration ends or after being triggered a certain number of times. When held rather than pressed, the Icy Quill's effect lasts longer and can be triggered more times. When one Cryo DMG instance strikes multiple opponents, the effect is triggered multiple times based on the number of opponents hit. The number of times the effect is triggered is calculated independently for each party member with the Icy Quill.

talents.name: Divine Maiden's Deliverance
talents.desc:
Unleashes the power of the Talisman Spirit, allowing it to roam free in this plane, dealing <color=cryo>AoE Cryo DMG</color>.

The Talisman Spirit then creates a field that decreases the <color=cryo>Cryo RES</color> and Physical RES of opponents within it. It also deals periodic <color=cryo>Cryo DMG</color> to opponents within the field.

talents.name: Deific Embrace
talents.desc: An active character within the field created by <color=skill>Divine Maiden's Deliverance</color> gains 15% <color=cryo>Cryo DMG Bonus</color>.

talents.name: Spirit Communion Seal
talents.desc:
After Shenhe uses <color=skill>Spring Spirit Summoning</color>, she will grant all nearby party members the following effects:
● Press: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG increased by 15% for 10s.
● Hold: Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG increased by 15% for 15s.

talents.name: Precise Comings and Goings
talents.desc: Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on a Liyue Expedition for 20 hours.

constellations.name: Clarity of Heart
constellations.desc: <color=skill>Spring Spirit Summoning</color> can be used 1 more time.

constellations.name: Centered Spirit
constellations.desc:
<color=skill>Divine Maiden's Deliverance</color> lasts for 6 seconds longer.
Active characters within the skill's field deal 15% increased <color=cryo>Cryo</color> CRIT DMG.

constellations.name: Seclusion
constellations.desc:
Increases Level of <color=skill>Spring Spirit Summoning</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Insight
constellations.desc:
When characters under the effect of Icy Quill applied by Shenhe triggers its DMG Bonus effects, Shenhe will gain a Skyfrost Mantra stack:
● When Shenhe uses <color=skill>Spring Spirit Summoning</color>, she will consume all stacks of Skyfrost Mantra, increasing the DMG of that <color=skill>Spring Spirit Summoning</color> by 5% for each stack consumed.
● Max 50 stacks. Stacks last for 60s.

constellations.name: Divine Attainment
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Divine Maiden's Deliverance</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Mystical Abandon
constellations.desc: When characters trigger Icy Quill's effects using Normal and Charged Attack DMG, it does not count toward the Trigger Quota.

talents.name: Cutting Torrent
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, the power of Hydro will accumulate on the arrowhead. An arrow fully charged with the torrent will deal Hydro DMG and apply the Riptide status. Riptide Opponents affected by Riptide will suffer from AoE Hydro DMG effects when attacked by Tartaglia in various ways. DMG dealt in this way is considered Normal Attack DMG. ● Riptide Flash: A fully-charged Aimed Shot that hits an opponent affected by Riptide deals consecutive bouts of AoE DMG. Can occur once every 0.7s. ● Riptide Burst: Defeating an opponent affected by Riptide creates a Hydro burst that inflicts the Riptide status on nearby opponents hit. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact. When Tartaglia is in Foul Legacy: Raging Tide's Melee Stance, he cannot perform a plunging attack.

talents.name: Foul Legacy: Raging Tide
talents.desc: Unleashes a set of weaponry made of pure water, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and entering Melee Stance. In this Stance, Tartaglia's Normal and Charged Attacks are converted to Hydro DMG that cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion and change as follows: Normal Attack Perform up to 6 consecutive Hydro strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a cross slash, dealing Hydro DMG. Riptide Slash Hitting an opponent affected by Riptide with a melee attack unleashes a Riptide Slash that deals AoE Hydro DMG. DMG dealt in this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG, and can only occur once every 1.5s. After 30s, or when the ability is unleashed again, this skill will end. Tartaglia will return to his Ranged Stance and this ability will enter CD. The longer Tartaglia stays in his Melee Stance, the longer the CD. If the return to a ranged stance occurs automatically after 30s, the CD is even longer.

talents.name: Havoc: Obliteration
talents.desc: Performs different attacks based on what stance Tartaglia is in when casting. Ranged Stance: Flash of Havoc Swiftly fires a Hydro-imbued magic arrow, dealing AoE Hydro DMG and applying the Riptide status. Returns a portion of its Energy Cost after use. Melee Stance: Light of Obliteration Performs a slash with a large AoE, dealing massive Hydro DMG to all surrounding opponents, which triggers Riptide Blast. Riptide Blast When the obliterating waters hit an opponent affected by Riptide, it clears their Riptide status and triggers a Hydro Explosion that deals AoE Hydro DMG. DMG dealt in this way is considered Elemental Burst DMG.

talents.name: Never Ending
talents.desc: Extends Riptide duration by 8s.

talents.name: Sword of Torrents
talents.desc: When Tartaglia is in <color=skill>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color>'s Melee stance, on dealing a CRIT hit, Normal and Charged Attacks apply the Riptide status effects to opponents.

talents.name: Master of Weaponry
talents.desc: Increases your own party members' Normal Attack Level by 1.

constellations.name: Foul Legacy: Tide Withholder
constellations.desc: Decreases the CD of <color=skill>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color> by 20%

constellations.name: Foul Legacy: Understream
constellations.desc: When opponents affected by Riptide are defeated, Tartaglia regenerates 4 Elemental Energy.

constellations.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Vortex of Turmoil
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Hydrospout
constellations.desc:
If Tartaglia is in <color=skill>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color>'s Melee Stance, triggers Riptide Slash against opponents on the field affected by Riptide every 4s, otherwise, triggers Riptide Flash.
Riptide Slashes and Riptide Flashes triggered by this Constellation effect are not subject to the time intervals that would typically apply to these two Riptide effects, nor do they have any effect on those time intervals.

constellations.name: Havoc: Formless Blade
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Havoc: Obliteration</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Havoc: Annihilation
constellations.desc:
When <color=skill>Havoc: Obliteration</color> is cast in Melee Stance, the CD of <color=skill>Foul Legacy: Raging Tide</color> is reset.
This effect will only take place once Tartaglia returns to his Ranged Stance.

talents.name: Khanda Barrier-Buster
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, the power of Dendro will accumulate on the arrowhead before the arrow is fired. Has different effects based on how long the energy has been charged: ● Charge Level 1: Tighnari fires a Dendro-infused arrow that deals Dendro DMG. ● Charge Level 2: Tighnari fires a Wreath Arrow that deals Dendro DMG. Upon hit, the Wreath Arrow will create 4 Clusterbloom Arrows that will track nearby opponents automatically and deal Dendro DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG on impact.

talents.name: Vijnana-Phala Mine
talents.desc:
Tighnari throws a Vijnana Stormheart ahead of him that deals <color=dendro>AoE Dendro DMG</color> and creates a Vijnana-Khanda Field, which summons strange illusions to taunt enemies and draw their fire.
Additionally, Tighnari gains the Vijnana Suffusion effect, which will decrease the Wreath Arrow's charging time by 2.4s. This effect will dissipate once the skill duration ends or after Tighnari has fired 3 Wreath Arrows.

talents.name: Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft
talents.desc:
Combines the power of all seeds to fire 6 Tanglevine Shafts that can track opponents and deal <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color>.

After they hit, the Tanglevine Shafts will create a secondary wave of Tanglevine Shafts that can also track opponents and deal <color=dendro>Dendro DMG</color> on hit.

talents.name: Keen Sight
talents.desc: After Tighnari fires a Wreath Arrow, his Elemental Mastery is increased by 50 for 4s.

talents.name: Scholarly Blade
talents.desc:
For every point of Elemental Mastery Tighnari possesses, his Charged Attack and <color=skill>Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft</color> DMG are increased by 0.06%.
The maximum DMG Bonus obtainable this way is 60%.

talents.name: Encyclopedic Knowledge
talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Sumeru on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Beginnings Determined at the Roots
constellations.desc: Tighnari's Charged Attack CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Origins Known From the Stem
constellations.desc:
When there are opponents within the Vijnana-Khanda Field created by <color=skill>Vijnana-Phala Mine</color>, Tighnari gains 20% <color=dendro>Dendro DMG Bonus</color>.
The effect will last up to 6s if the field's duration ends or if it no longer has opponents within it.

constellations.name: Fortunes Read Amongst the Branches
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Withering Glimpsed in the Leaves
constellations.desc: When <color=skill>Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft</color> is unleashed, all nearby party members gain 60 Elemental Mastery for 8s. If the <color=skill>Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft</color> triggers a Burning, Bloom, Quicken, or Spread reaction, their Elemental Mastery will be further increased by 60. This latter case will also refresh the buff state's duration.

constellations.name: Comprehension Amidst the Flowers
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Vijnana-Phala Mine</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Karma Adjudged From the Leaden Fruit
constellations.desc: Wreath Arrow's charging time is decreased by 0.9s, and will produce 1 additional Clusterbloom Arrow upon hit. This arrow deals 150% of Tighnari's ATK as DMG.

talents.name: Divine Marksmanship
talents.desc: Normal Attack Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, favorable winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged wind arrow will deal Anemo DMG. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Skyward Sonnet
talents.desc: O wind upon which all hymns and songs fly, bear these earth-walkers up into the sky! Press Summons a Wind Domain at the opponent's location, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching opponents into the air. Hold Summons an even larger Wind Domain with Venti as the epicenter, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching affected opponents into the air. After unleashing the Hold version of this ability, Venti rides the wind into the air. Opponents hit by Skyward Sonnet will fall to the ground slowly.

talents.name: Wind's Grand Ode
talents.desc:
Fires off an arrow made of countless coalesced winds, creating a huge <color=skill>Stormeye</color> that sucks in opponents and deals continuous <color=anemo>Anemo DMG</color>.

Elemental Absorption
If the <color=skill>Stormeye</color> comes into contact with <color=hydro>Hydro</color>/<color=pyro>Pyro</color>/<color=cryo>Cryo</color>/<color=electro>Electro</color>, it will deal additional Elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

talents.name: Embrace of Winds
talents.desc: Holding <color=skill>Skyward Sonnet</color> creates an upcurrent that lasts for 20s.

talents.name: Stormeye
talents.desc: Regenerates 15 Energy for Venti after the effects of <color=skill>Wind's Grand Ode</color> end. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, this also restores 15 Energy to all characters of that corresponding element.

talents.name: Windrider
talents.desc:
Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Splitting Gales
constellations.desc: Fires 2 additional arrows per Aimed Shot, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.

constellations.name: Breeze of Reminiscence
constellations.desc:
<color=skill>Skyward Sonnet</color> decreases opponents' <color=anemo>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES by 12% for 10s.
Opponents launched by <color=skill>Skyward Sonnet</color> suffer an additional 12% <color=anemo>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

constellations.name: Ode to Thousand Winds
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Wind's Grand Ode</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Hurricane of Freedom
constellations.desc: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% <color=anemo>Anemo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.

constellations.name: Concerto dal Cielo
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Skyward Sonnet</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Storm of Defiance
constellations.desc:
Targets who take DMG from <color=skill>Wind's Grand Ode</color> have their <color=anemo>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 20%.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

talents.name: Yuuban Meigen
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 3 attacks using wind blades, dealing Anemo DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina, gathers a build up of high wind pressure, and deals AoE Anemo DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Calling upon the power of Anemo, the Wanderer plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in his path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Hanega: Song of the Wind
talents.desc: Concentrates the power of the winds to break free from the shackles of the earth, dealing AoE Anemo DMG before leaping into the air and entering the Windfavored state. Windfavored The Wanderer cannot perform Plunging Attacks in this state. When he uses Normal and Charged Attacks, they will be converted into Kuugo: Fushoudan and Kuugo: Toufukai respectively; the DMG they deal and their AoE will be increased, and their DMG will be considered Normal and Charged Attack DMG respectively. Kuugo: Toufukai will not consume Stamina. The Wanderer will hover persistently during this time. While this state is active, the Wanderer's movements gain the following properties:Persistently consumes Kuugoryoku Points to maintain this hovering state.When sprinting, additional Kuugoryoku Points will be consumed for the Wanderer to accelerate mid-air. Holding sprint will cause persistent Kuugoryoku Point consumption to maintain speed. This effect will replace his default sprint.Jumping expends extra Kuugoryoku Points to increase hovering height. Holding jump will cause persistent Kuugoryoku Point consumption to keep increasing hovering height. Running out of Kuugoryoku Points will end the Windfavored state. A second cast during the duration of Windfavored will also end it.

talents.name: Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays
talents.desc: Compresses the atmosphere into a singlular vacuum that grinds all troubles away, dealing multiple instances of <color=anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</color>. If the character is in the Windfavored state due to the skill "Hanega: Song of the Wind," Windfavored state will end after casting.

talents.name: Jade-Claimed Flower
talents.desc:
If Hanega: Song of the Wind comes into contact with **Hydro**/**Pyro**/**Cryo**/**Electro** when it is unleashed, this instance of the Windfavored state will obtain buffs according to the contacted element(s):**Hydro**: Kuugoryoku Point cap increases by 20.**Pyro**: ATK increases by 30%.**Cryo**: CRIT Rate increases by 20%.**Electro**: When Normal and Charged Attacks hit an opponent, 0.8 Energy will be restored. Energy can be restored this way every 0.2s.
You can have up to 2 different kinds of these buffs simultaneously.

talents.name: Gales of Reverie
talents.desc:
When the Wanderer hits opponents with Kuugo: Fushoudan or Kuugo: Toufukai in his Windfavored state, he has a 16% chance to obtain the Descent effect: The next time the Wanderer accelerates in mid-air while in this instance of the Windfavored state, this effect will be removed, this acceleration instance will not consume any Kuugoryoku Points, and he will fire off 4 wind arrows that deal 35% of his ATK as <color=anemo>Anemo DMG</color> each.
For each Kuugo: Fushoudan and Kuugo: Toufukai that does not produce this effect, the next attack of those types will have a 12% increased chance of producing it. The calculation of the effect production is done once every 0.1s.

talents.name: Strum the Swirling Winds
talents.desc: Mora expended when ascending Bows and Catalysts is decreased by 50%.

constellations.name: Shoban: Ostentatious Plumage
constellations.desc:
When in the Windfavored state, the Attack SPD of the Wanderer's Kuugo: Fushoudan and Kuugo: Toufukai is increased by 10%.
Additionally, the wind arrows fired by the Passive Talent "Gales of Reverie" will deal an additional 25% of his ATK as DMG. You must unlock the Passive Talent "Gales of Reverie" first.

constellations.name: Niban: Moonlit Isle Amidst White Waves
constellations.desc:
When in the Windfavored state, Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays will see its DMG increased by 4% per point of difference between the max amount of Kuugoryoku Points contrasted with Kuugoryoku's present capacity when using this skill.
Through this method, you can increase Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays's DMG by a maximum of 200%.

constellations.name: Sanban: Moonflower Kusemai
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Yonban: Set Adrift into Spring
constellations.desc:
When casting Hanega: Song of the Wind, should the Passive Talent "Jade-Claimed Flower" be triggered, the character will gain buffs in correspondence to the contacted Elemental Type(s), and also obtain a random untriggered buff. A maximum of 3 such corresponding elemental buffs can exist simultaneously.
You must unlock the Passive Talent "Jade-Claimed Flower" first.

constellations.name: Matsuban: Ancient Illuminator From Abroad
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of Hanega: Song of the Wind by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Shugen: The Curtains' Melancholic Sway
constellations.desc:
When the Wanderer actively hits an opponent with Kuugo: Fushoudan while in the Windfavored state, the following effects will occur:
Deals an additional instance of Kuugo: Fushoudan at the position hit, dealing 40% of the attack's original DMG. This DMG will be considered Normal Attack DMG.
When the Wanderer falls below 40 Kuugoryoku Points, restores 4 Points to him. Kuugoryoku Points can be restored in this manner once every 0.2s. This restoration can occur up to 5 times within one Windfavored duration.

talents.name: Whirlwind Thrust
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward thrust. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact. Xiao does not take DMG from performing Plunging Attacks.

talents.name: Lemniscatic Wind Cycling
talents.desc:
Xiao lunges forward, dealing <color=anemo>Anemo DMG</color> to opponents in his path.
Can be used in mid-air.
Starts with 2 charges.

talents.name: Bane of All Evil
talents.desc: Xiao dons the Yaksha Mask that set gods and demons trembling millennia ago. Yaksha's Mask ● Greatly increases Xiao's jumping ability. ● Increases his attack AoE and attack DMG. ● Converts attack DMG into Anemo DMG, which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion. In this state, Xiao will continuously lose HP. The effects of this skill end when Xiao leaves the field.

talents.name: Conqueror of Evil: Tamer of Demons
talents.desc: While under the effects of <color=skill>Bane of All Evil</color>, all DMG dealt by Xiao increases by 5%. DMG increases by a further 5% for every 3s the ability persists. The maximum DMG Bonus is 25%.

talents.name: Dissolution Eon: Heaven Fall
talents.desc: Using <color=skill>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> increases the DMG of subsequent uses of <color=skill>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> by 15%. This effect lasts for 7s, and has a maximum of 3 stacks. Gaining a new stack refreshes the effect's duration.

talents.name: Transcension: Gravity Defier
talents.desc:
Decreases climbing Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellations.name: Dissolution Eon: Destroyer of Worlds
constellations.desc: Increases <color=skill>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color>'s charges by 1.

constellations.name: Annihilation Eon: Blossom of Kaleidos
constellations.desc: When in the party and not on the field, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.

constellations.name: Conqueror of Evil: Wrath Deity
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Transcension: Extinction of Suffering
constellations.desc: When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, he gains a 100% DEF Bonus.

constellations.name: Evolution Eon: Origin of Ignorance
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Bane of All Evil</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha
constellations.desc: While under the effects of <color=skill>Bane of All Evil</color>, hitting at least 2 opponents with Xiao's Plunging Attack will immediately grant him 1 charge of <color=skill>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color>, and for the next 1s, he may use <color=skill>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> while ignoring its CD.

talents.name: Spiritfox Sin-Eater
talents.desc: Normal Attack Summons forth kitsune spirits, initiating a maximum of 3 attacks that deal Electro DMG. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal Electro DMG after a short casting time. Plunging Attack Plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path with thunderous might. Deals AoE Electro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura
talents.desc: To Yae, such dull tasks as can be accomplished by driving spirits out need not be done personally. Moves swiftly, leaving a Sesshou Sakura behind. Sesshou Sakura Has the following properties: ● Periodically strikes one nearby opponent with lightning, dealing Electro DMG ● When there are other Sesshou Sakura nearby, their level will increase, boosting the DMG dealt by these lightning strikes. This skill has three charges. A maximum of 3 Sesshou Sakura can exist simultaneously. The initial level of each Sesshou Sakura is 1, and the initial highest level each sakura can reach is 3. If a new Sesshou Sakura is created too close to an existing one, the existing one will be destroyed.

talents.name: Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin
talents.desc:
Legends of "kitsunetsuki," or the manifestations of a kitsune's might, are common in Inazuma's folktales. One that particularly captures the imagination is that of the Sky Kitsune, said to cause lightning to fall down upon the foes of the Grand Narukami Shrine. Summons a lightning strike, dealing <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color>.
When she uses this skill, Yae Miko will unseal nearby Sesshou Sakura, destroying their outer forms and transforming them into Tenko Thunderbolts that descend from the skies, dealing <color=electro>AoE Electro DMG</color>. Each Sesshou Sakura destroyed in this way will create one Tenko Thunderbolt.

talents.name: The Shrine's Sacred Shade
talents.desc: When casting <color=skill>Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin</color>, each Sesshou Sakura destroyed resets the cooldown for 1 charge of <color=skill>Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura</color>.

talents.name: Enlightened Blessing
talents.desc: Every point of Elemental Mastery Yae Miko possesses will increase Sesshou Sakura DMG by 0.15%.

talents.name: Meditations of a Yako
talents.desc: Has a 25% chance to get 1 regional Character Talent Material (base material excluded) when crafting. The rarity is that of the base material.

constellations.name: Yakan Offering
constellations.desc: Each time <color=skill>Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin</color> activates a Tenko Thunderbolt, Yae Miko will restore 8 Elemental Energy for herself.

constellations.name: Fox's Mooncall
constellations.desc: Sesshou Sakura start at Level 2 when created, their max level is increased to 4, and their attack range is increased by 60%.

constellations.name: The Seven Glamours
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura</color> by 3.
Maximum ugprade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sakura Channeling
constellations.desc: When Sesshou Sakura lightning hits opponents, the <color=electro>Electro DMG Bonus</color> of all nearby party members is increased by 20% for 5s.

constellations.name: Mischievous Teasing
constellations.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=skill>Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Forbidden Art: Daisesshou
constellations.desc: The Sesshou Sakura's attacks will ignore 60% of the opponent's DEF.

talents.name: Stealthy Bowshot
talents.desc: Normal Attack Performs up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, flowing water will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged torrential arrow will deal Hydro DMG. Breakthrough Yelan will enter a "Breakthrough" state after spending 5s out of combat, which will cause her next Charged Aimed Shot to have 80% decreased charge time, and once charged, she can fire a "Breakthrough Barb" that will deal AoE Hydro DMG based on Yelan's Max HP. Plunging Attack Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Lingering Lifeline
talents.desc: Fires off a Lifeline that allows her to move rapidly, entangling and marking opponents along its path.
